transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs to make some changes. Its views on some things are old. Many people do not agree with the Church on things like gay marriage, birth control, and abortion. The Church has strong views on these topics. But these views make some people leave the Church. 

Some people do not like the Church's views on these things. They think the Church is wrong. For example, the Church is against abortion. 

People who want abortion might not want to be part of a church that says it is wrong. The same is true for gay marriage. People who support gay marriage might not want to be in a church that does not. 

I think the Church should allow women to be priests. I think priests should be able to marry. But I do not know if this would have stopped bad things from happening in the Church.  

The Church says priests are married to God. They give their life to God. But everyone else has a job and a family. I do not see why priests cannot have both.

I am not against gay marriage.  I think people are born this way.  It is not a choice.  Gay people should not be sad because of who they are. 

It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex cannot. I think this is bad.

I do not think the government should say what people can do.  It is not a law issue. It is not a bad thing.  Gay people should not be punished for who they are. 

People should be free to love who they want.

Gay marriage is good. Many people say it is bad. They say it hurts families. But gay people want the same things as straight people. They want to love and be loved. They want to build a life with someone. 

Gay people want the same rights as everyone else. If a person is sick, their partner should be able to visit them in the hospital.  Gay people should be able to share property and make health care decisions for each other.

Some people think gay marriage hurts children. But studies show that children of gay parents are just like other children. They are happy and healthy. 

Gay people are asking for a simple thing: the right to marry. This is a legal right, not a religious one. The government should not tell people what to believe. 

The government should treat everyone fairly. This means allowing gay people to marry.

I work in a hospital. I help give medicine to people. I see drugs every day. Some drugs are bad. Some drugs are good.  The law says some drugs are bad. But the law is not always right.

Some bad drugs are good for people. Doctors use them to help people.  Marijuana is bad. The law says it is bad. But it can help some people. It is good medicine.

Some people say marijuana is bad like alcohol. Alcohol is bad too. But people use it every day. Marijuana is not as bad as other drugs.  We need to think about marijuana in a new way.

We need to change how we see marijuana. It is not as bad as people think.  The law should change. Marijuana can be good medicine.

The church has changed. It is not as strict now. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a nice dress, shoes, and purse. 

I went to a private school. I saw my friends at church on weekends. Now, there is a special mass for teens. It is shorter. People dress more casually. In summer, people come in beach clothes. Families come in late.

Even at the morning mass, people wear jeans and khakis. 

I do not know much about church politics.

[About the bad things that priests have done, do you think the church could have stopped this?]

I do not think so. Some married men become bad. They like young children. Marriage does not stop this.

It is the person, not marriage. Priests choose to be priests. Some religions allow priests to marry. If a person wants to be married, they could join a different religion.

[Can you say more?]

I mean, the bad things. I think it is in a person's genes.

I do not think people choose to be bad. I think they are born this way.

Marriage cannot hide this.

The church may not have known about all of this.

[Do you have other thoughts about the church?]

No.

I start good with the plan. But, many people sad after the September 11th attacks. Our country went to Iraq. The Bush group said Iraq bad. They said Iraq had bad tools. This is not true.

The Bush group lied to the people. Colin Powell said he did not believe the proof. This is wrong. It is bad for a leader to lie.

The Bush group does not like the rules of the country. They want to make new rules.

I think the Bush group wanted war. They wanted to fight Iraq. 

The Bush group wanted to help our country get more energy. This is not fair.

The war in Iraq is long. It is bad to leave now. Iraq may fight each other.

Many countries want to help Iraq. This may be a bad idea. Iraq should be in charge of itself.

The leader of Iraq does not have power. Iraq has many groups that fight. The government is not strong.

I talk about the war in Iraq.

It is not a real war. We did not say it was a war.

I do not like the war. It is not fair.

We use guns to show we are strong. But it is not a good reason.

We should help Iraq. But it is hard.

It is bad for our country.

Many people are hurting.

It is hard to say what to do.

I think it is not right to make this act legal. The state should not say it is legal. I think the churches should decide. The Constitution says to keep church and state separate. This is clear. 

Trying to make a law about this is wrong. It goes against what the Constitution says.  

Some people want to make this act illegal. This is unfair. Some churches do not like this act. But the government should not tell churches what to do.

Separation of church and state is important. It lets people have different beliefs. Making a law about this would be wrong. It would go against the Constitution. This law would hurt people, not help.

I do not think the government should be involved. The person who wants this law does not like this act. He does not like it because of his religion. 

It is up to the churches to decide. Not the president or the government. There is no good reason to make a law about this. I do not think it will help the country.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the real reason for war. They said the war was about the attacks on September 11th. This is not true. The government made people think this way to make them angry. They wanted to start the war. 

I do not like war. I do not like to start wars.  

The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government made the same mistakes. Many American soldiers died.

The government did not plan for what would happen after the war. They took away the Iraqi government. They did not know what to do next. They wanted to make Iraq a democracy. This is what they did in Vietnam. They wanted to stop communists. 

But this was hard. People did not want to be ruled by the United States.

The government should have known this would be hard.  They should have planned better.

The war is still going on. Many soldiers are still dying. The United States is still trying to help Iraq. It takes time to make a new government. 

The government made people think the war would be easy. This was not true.

The war is hard. We should not start wars.

I like gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a choice. It is part of who a person is. Some think it is a choice.  But now people see it is how a person is made.  It is not fair to take away rights from people because of this. It is not right. 

I think the government should not say what people can do. Marriage is between people. It is not the government's job. There are gay couples in my neighborhood. They are like other families. They walk dogs and do things like other families.

Some people think the government should say what marriage is. I think this is wrong.

I have read that being gay is part of how a person is made. It may be in the brain.

Marriage is a private thing. People should be able to do what they want. If a man and a woman want to marry, they can. If two men or two women want to marry, they should be able to, too.

Think of the web like a big open space.

When you put things on the web, many people can see them.

You can not control what people think.

If you write bad things, people will think bad things about you.

I work with students at a school.

I have seen this happen.

People write things on the web.

They can be serious or not.

The school has to know if something is bad.

They must act if they see danger.

But, it can be hard to know what is real.

Some people joke.

Some people mean harm.

The school has a friend at the school.

They told the school about some things a student wrote.

The student did not mean to cause trouble.

But the words were bad.

The school had to act.

The web is public.

If you do not want people to see it, do not put it on the web.

You can not tell people what to think.

The school should not look at your web page.

But, if someone tells them about something bad, they must look.

They must keep everyone safe.

The war has gone on too long. At first, the goal was good. We wanted to help a country have a fair government. But now, I think we fight just to show we are strong. Maybe the reasons for starting the war were not good. President Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein before.

If the goal was to give people democracy, that is a good reason to fight. But I think the reason why we are still fighting is not clear. We started the war a long time ago. We did make a strong statement then.

Now, the war has lasted for many years. I think it should end.

The people in the country need to solve their own problems. We have spent a lot of money on the war. We need to use that money to help people in our own country. We have problems with poverty and need to fix our roads and schools. 

We need to help people who are sick. It is not right to spend money sending our soldiers to fight in a war we no longer have a good reason to be in.

Can I ask a question? I want to know why the thing was stopped. Someone saw it on the Web.

No, I do not think this is bad for privacy. On sites like Myspace, you can see other people's things if they put them online. On Myspace, you need to be friends with someone to see their page. But if you are friends, they let you see it.

When you put things on the Web, many people can see them. I think it is good if someone saw this and stopped a bad thing from happening.

It is hard to watch all the students' pages all day. This would be bad. It would be unfair to look at only the "bad" students. I do not think it is right to have someone watch everyone's pages. But it depends on the situation. Was someone looking for something bad, or were they just looking at pages?

I do not have Myspace, but I have Facebook. It worries me that some bad people can see things about me. I saw on TV a man who showed how easy it is to get information about people. He found a girl's name and talked to her on the computer. He met her in a short time.

I would not meet someone like that. But some people in my classes send me messages. They know it is me even though I do not know them. It is hard because they know my interests and where I am during the day. They know my friends. They know a lot about me. I try to keep my Facebook safe. But I also want to use it to talk to friends. It is a hard problem.

I only accept friends I know. But you never know who can see things.

My roommate said her high school stopped students from using Myspace. I thought this was strange. How can the school tell students what they can and cannot do on the Web? I do not know if this is a privacy problem. I do not know if the school has the right to do this.

We talk about the war in Iraq. I feel bad to say this. I do not want to join the people who say they were against the war from the start. I was against it. But it is not important now.

Many people think the war was bad. The polls show this. People in the United States, Iraq, and the world think the war was a bad idea. Most U.S. troops in Iraq think the war was bad and we should leave.

The war was bad from the start. Leaving will also be bad. It is hard to do anything right in the Middle East.

The United States and Middle Eastern countries are very different. The United States wants to bring democracy to the Middle East. This is not the right way. People in the Middle East want to run their own lives.

Saddam Hussein was bad. But we should think about the good and bad before going to war with a country. We should not invade. The war is like quicksand. We cannot get out. I do not know what to say.

I do not see a reason to stay in Iraq. The government may have good reasons to stay. But I do not agree. We should leave. We could leave slowly over a year or more. But I think we should leave now.

Eighty percent of Iraqis want us to leave this year. Many want us to leave now. These are the people we are trying to help. They want us to leave.

If we ask them if we should leave, and they say yes, then it is not our fault if things go wrong.

We will not be good guys in the Middle East. But leaving is better than staying.

Yes, I think that men and women have different problems in the United States.

Women still face problems. This is true in many jobs.

Men have problems too. For example, men who stay at home with children are sometimes looked down on.

In some jobs, like fashion, men can face problems too.

People think that men in fashion do not know much about it.

I think that people should accept men and women in all jobs.

It is taking time, but we are making progress.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it not a crime. This is like a traffic ticket. You get a note. You do not go to jail. 

Some people worry about jobs. A ticket is still bad. It is on your record.

It costs a lot to put people in jail. It costs more to keep them there.

Some places have money problems. They do not want to spend money on jails. 

Denver is different. People there like marijuana. They think it is good to have money for schools and help for people.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not good for everyone. People should not drive after using it.

Marijuana is still bad in some places. People feel awkward about it.

Alcohol is bad for driving. Marijuana is bad for lives.

Different people react to drugs differently. Some use too much. Some use a little.

Yes.

Many things in the Catholic Church are old. They do the same things for a long time. 

It is good to have rules. But it is also good to change.

Some Catholics go to church every week. They follow the rules carefully. Sometimes I feel the Church does not like people who do not follow the rules. The Church does not like people who are not perfect Catholics. The Church does not like people of other religions.

My dad was an Episcopalian. My mom was a Catholic. The Church would not marry them. 

This is not kind to people of other religions. We learn to love others. But the Church does not love others. They say they love others, but they do not act that way.

The Church tells people to do things, but the Church does not always follow its own rules. The rules are old.

Some people think priests should be able to marry. I think this is a good idea. But it will not stop bad priests. Some priests hurt children.

People hurt children for many reasons. It is not about marriage.

I am not sure what I think about this big issue. It is hard to say if one side is right or wrong. This is a hard problem. It is about the church and the state. It is also about how we say what marriage is. This is hard because we do not want to hurt anyone's feelings.

I think all unions should be the same. I do not know if marriage should be defined by the government. Marriage is a religious thing. People do not get tax breaks for being baptized. The government does not watch them in a special way.

If you are married, the government should see it as a civil union. It is two people. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

Gay marriage is the same. Two people got a civil union.

All states should agree on a good answer. Then they can make it a law for all of the country.

It is not right to change the constitution to ban gay marriage. The constitution should not be changed for this. It is important to some people, but not enough to change the constitution. It is not that important.

I live in a Christian home. This makes me think about gay people. I have gay friends. I do not agree with their life. But I think they should have the right to marry. I think each state should decide this, not the president.

Some states are Democrat. Some states are Republican. Democrat states like gay marriage. People who live there know this. If a state legalizes gay marriage, people there should respect that. They chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as other people. Each state should decide if they want to legalize gay marriage. 

I do not think the president should say no to gay marriage for the whole country. Gay marriage should be up to each state. The president does not live in every state. He should not tell states how to run their own lives. Maybe a new president will change the law.

Each state should decide about gay marriage. They are the ones who live there.

Myspace is for the public. You can see what other people post. If you post on Myspace, you must know that others will see it.  School officials can see it too. They can see it at home.

If the school sees something bad on Myspace, they have a right to see it. 

The school wants to keep students safe. They must stop bad things from happening. If looking at Myspace helps them do that, it is okay.

School officials should not look at Myspace just to find students doing bad things. But if they see something that makes them worried, it is okay. 

Parents want their children to be safe at school. Schools must be safe. After bad things happened, schools practiced drills. They did this to keep students safe.

The school officials did the same thing. They looked at Myspace to keep the school safe. They wanted to stop bad things like school shootings.

The war is bad.

I was sad about nine eleven. I want the bad people to stop hurting us. At first, I want to fight them. Now I think it was a bad idea.

We did not think much before we went to war. We did not have a plan. It did not work.

The people there fight with each other. We can not help them if they fight. We need to go home.

I do not like the people there. They fight all the time.

We did not know what would happen. War is different there. I think they want us to leave. 

We should leave. We were angry and want revenge. 

We should have a better plan. We did not know what to do.

The Catholic Church needs to make some changes. Its views on some things are old. Many people do not agree with the Church on things like gay marriage, birth control, and abortion. The Church has strong views on these topics. But these views make some people leave the Church. 

Some people do not like the Church's views on these things. They think the Church is wrong. For example, the Church is against abortion. 

People who want abortion might not want to be part of a church that says it is wrong. The same is true for gay marriage. People who support gay marriage might not want to be in a church that does not. 

I think the Church should allow women to be priests. I think priests should be able to marry. But I do not know if this would have stopped bad things from happening in the Church.  

The Church says priests are married to God. They give their life to God. But everyone else has a job and a family. I do not see why priests cannot have both.

I am not against gay marriage.  I think people are born this way.  It is not a choice.  Gay people should not be sad because of who they are. 

It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex cannot. I think this is bad.

I do not think the government should say what people can do.  It is not a law issue. It is not a bad thing.  Gay people should not be punished for who they are. 

People should be free to love who they want.

Gay marriage is good. Many people say it is bad. They say it hurts families. But gay people want the same things as straight people. They want to love and be loved. They want to build a life with someone. 

Gay people want the same rights as everyone else. If a person is sick, their partner should be able to visit them in the hospital.  Gay people should be able to share property and make health care decisions for each other.

Some people think gay marriage hurts children. But studies show that children of gay parents are just like other children. They are happy and healthy. 

Gay people are asking for a simple thing: the right to marry. This is a legal right, not a religious one. The government should not tell people what to believe. 

The government should treat everyone fairly. This means allowing gay people to marry.

I work in a hospital. I help give medicine to people. I see drugs every day. Some drugs are bad. Some drugs are good.  The law says some drugs are bad. But the law is not always right.

Some bad drugs are good for people. Doctors use them to help people.  Marijuana is bad. The law says it is bad. But it can help some people. It is good medicine.

Some people say marijuana is bad like alcohol. Alcohol is bad too. But people use it every day. Marijuana is not as bad as other drugs.  We need to think about marijuana in a new way.

We need to change how we see marijuana. It is not as bad as people think.  The law should change. Marijuana can be good medicine.

The church has changed. It is not as strict now. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a nice dress, shoes, and purse. 

I went to a private school. I saw my friends at church on weekends. Now, there is a special mass for teens. It is shorter. People dress more casually. In summer, people come in beach clothes. Families come in late.

Even at the morning mass, people wear jeans and khakis. 

I do not know much about church politics.

[About the bad things that priests have done, do you think the church could have stopped this?]

I do not think so. Some married men become bad. They like young children. Marriage does not stop this.

It is the person, not marriage. Priests choose to be priests. Some religions allow priests to marry. If a person wants to be married, they could join a different religion.

[Can you say more?]

I mean, the bad things. I think it is in a person's genes.

I start good with the plan. But, many people sad after the September 11th attacks. Our country went to Iraq. The Bush group said Iraq bad. They said Iraq had bad tools. This is not true.

The Bush group lied to the people. Colin Powell said he did not believe the proof. This is wrong. It is bad for a leader to lie.

The Bush group does not like the rules of the country. They want to make new rules.

I think the Bush group wanted war. They wanted to fight Iraq. 

The Bush group wanted to help our country get more energy. This is not fair.

The war in Iraq is long. It is bad to leave now. Iraq may fight each other.

Many countries want to help Iraq. This may be a bad idea. Iraq should be in charge of itself.

The leader of Iraq does not have power. Iraq has many groups that fight. The government is not strong.

I talk about the war in Iraq.

It is not a real war. We did not say it was a war.

I do not like the war. It is not fair.

We use guns to show we are strong. But it is not a good reason.

We should help Iraq. But it is hard.

It is bad for our country.

Many people are hurting.

It is hard to say what to do.

I think it is not right to make this act legal. The state should not say it is legal. I think the churches should decide. The Constitution says to keep church and state separate. This is clear. 

Trying to make a law about this is wrong. It goes against what the Constitution says.  

Some people want to make this act illegal. This is unfair. Some churches do not like this act. But the government should not tell churches what to do.

Separation of church and state is important. It lets people have different beliefs. Making a law about this would be wrong. It would go against the Constitution. This law would hurt people, not help.

I do not think the government should be involved. The person who wants this law does not like this act. He does not like it because of his religion. 

It is up to the churches to decide. Not the president or the government. There is no good reason to make a law about this. I do not think it will help the country.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the real reason for war. They said the war was about the attacks on September 11th. This is not true. The government made people think this way to make them angry. They wanted to start the war. 

I do not like war. I do not like to start wars.  

The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government made the same mistakes. Many American soldiers died.

The government did not plan for what would happen after the war. They took away the Iraqi government. They did not know what to do next. They wanted to make Iraq a democracy. This is what they did in Vietnam. They wanted to stop communists. 

But this was hard. People did not want to be ruled by the United States.

The government should have known this would be hard.  They should have planned better.

The war is still going on. Many soldiers are still dying. The United States is still trying to help Iraq. It takes time to make a new government. 

The government made people think the war would be easy. This was not true.

The war is hard. We should not start wars.

I like gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a choice. It is part of who a person is. Some think it is a choice.  But now people see it is how a person is made.  It is not fair to take away rights from people because of this. It is not right. 

I think the government should not say what people can do. Marriage is between people. It is not the government's job. There are gay couples in my neighborhood. They are like other families. They walk dogs and do things like other families.

Some people think the government should say what marriage is. I think this is wrong.

I have read that being gay is part of how a person is made. It may be in the brain.

Marriage is a private thing. People should be able to do what they want. If a man and a woman want to marry, they can. If two men or two women want to marry, they should be able to, too.

Think of the web like a big open space.

When you put things on the web, many people can see them.

You can not control what people think.

If you write bad things, people will think bad things about you.

I work with students at a school.

I have seen this happen.

People write things on the web.

They can be serious or not.

The school has to know if something is bad.

They must act if they see danger.

But, it can be hard to know what is real.

Some people joke.

Some people mean harm.

The school has a friend at the school.

They told the school about some things a student wrote.

The student did not mean to cause trouble.

But the words were bad.

The school had to act.

The web is public.

If you do not want people to see it, do not put it on the web.

You can not tell people what to think.

The school should not look at your web page.

But, if someone tells them about something bad, they must look.

They must keep everyone safe.

The war has gone on too long. At first, the goal was good. We wanted to help a country have a fair government. But now, I think we fight just to show we are strong. Maybe the reasons for starting the war were not good. President Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein before.

If the goal was to give people democracy, that is a good reason to fight. But I think the reason why we are still fighting is not clear. We started the war a long time ago. We did make a strong statement then.

Now, the war has lasted for many years. I think it should end.

The people in the country need to solve their own problems. We have spent a lot of money on the war. We need to use that money to help people in our own country. We have problems with poverty and need to fix our roads and schools. 

We need to help people who are sick. It is not right to spend money sending our soldiers to fight in a war we no longer have a good reason to be in.

Can I ask a question? I want to know why the thing was stopped. Someone saw it on the Web.

No, I do not think this is bad for privacy. On sites like Myspace, you can see other people's things if they put them online. On Myspace, you need to be friends with someone to see their page. But if you are friends, they let you see it.

When you put things on the Web, many people can see them. I think it is good if someone saw this and stopped a bad thing from happening.

It is hard to watch all the students' pages all day. This would be bad. It would be unfair to look at only the "bad" students. I do not think it is right to have someone watch everyone's pages. But it depends on the situation. Was someone looking for something bad, or were they just looking at pages?

I do not have Myspace, but I have Facebook. It worries me that some bad people can see things about me. I saw on TV a man who showed how easy it is to get information about people. He found a girl's name and talked to her on the computer. He met her in a short time.

I would not meet someone like that. But some people in my classes send me messages. They know it is me even though I do not know them. It is hard because they know my interests and where I am during the day. They know my friends. They know a lot about me. I try to keep my Facebook safe. But I also want to use it to talk to friends. It is a hard problem.

I only accept friends I know. But you never know who can see things.

My roommate said her high school stopped students from using Myspace. I thought this was strange. How can the school tell students what they can and cannot do on the Web? I do not know if this is a privacy problem. I do not know if the school has the right to do this.

We talk about the war in Iraq. I feel bad to say this. I do not want to join the people who say they were against the war from the start. I was against it. But it is not important now.

Many people think the war was bad. The polls show this. People in the United States, Iraq, and the world think the war was a bad idea. Most U.S. troops in Iraq think the war was bad and we should leave.

The war was bad from the start. Leaving will also be bad. It is hard to do anything right in the Middle East.

The United States and Middle Eastern countries are very different. The United States wants to bring democracy to the Middle East. This is not the right way. People in the Middle East want to run their own lives.

Saddam Hussein was bad. But we should think about the good and bad before going to war with a country. We should not invade. The war is like quicksand. We cannot get out. I do not know what to say.

I do not see a reason to stay in Iraq. The government may have good reasons to stay. But I do not agree. We should leave. We could leave slowly over a year or more. But I think we should leave now.

Eighty percent of Iraqis want us to leave this year. Many want us to leave now. These are the people we are trying to help. They want us to leave.

If we ask them if we should leave, and they say yes, then it is not our fault if things go wrong.

We will not be good guys in the Middle East. But leaving is better than staying.

Yes, I think that men and women have different problems in the United States.

Women still face problems. This is true in many jobs.

Men have problems too. For example, men who stay at home with children are sometimes looked down on.

In some jobs, like fashion, men can face problems too.

People think that men in fashion do not know much about it.

I think that people should accept men and women in all jobs.

It is taking time, but we are making progress.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it not a crime. This is like a traffic ticket. You get a note. You do not go to jail. 

Some people worry about jobs. A ticket is still bad. It is on your record.

It costs a lot to put people in jail. It costs more to keep them there.

Some places have money problems. They do not want to spend money on jails. 

Denver is different. People there like marijuana. They think it is good to have money for schools and help for people.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not good for everyone. People should not drive after using it.

Marijuana is still bad in some places. People feel awkward about it.

Alcohol is bad for driving. Marijuana is bad for lives.

Different people react to drugs differently. Some use too much. Some use a little.

Yes.

Many things in the Catholic Church are old. They do the same things for a long time. 

It is good to have rules. But it is also good to change.

Some Catholics go to church every week. They follow the rules carefully. Sometimes I feel the Church does not like people who do not follow the rules. The Church does not like people who are not perfect Catholics. The Church does not like people of other religions.

My dad was an Episcopalian. My mom was a Catholic. The Church would not marry them. 

This is not kind to people of other religions. We learn to love others. But the Church does not love others. They say they love others, but they do not act that way.

The Church tells people to do things, but the Church does not always follow its own rules. The rules are old.

Some people think priests should be able to marry. I think this is a good idea. But it will not stop bad priests. Some priests hurt children.

People hurt children for many reasons. It is not about marriage.

I am not sure what I think about this big issue. It is hard to say if one side is right or wrong. This is a hard problem. It is about the church and the state. It is also about how we say what marriage is. This is hard because we do not want to hurt anyone's feelings.

I think all unions should be the same. I do not know if marriage should be defined by the government. Marriage is a religious thing. People do not get tax breaks for being baptized. The government does not watch them in a special way.

If you are married, the government should see it as a civil union. It is two people. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

Gay marriage is the same. Two people got a civil union.

All states should agree on a good answer. Then they can make it a law for all of the country.

It is not right to change the constitution to ban gay marriage. The constitution should not be changed for this. It is important to some people, but not enough to change the constitution. It is not that important.

I live in a Christian home. This makes me think about gay people. I have gay friends. I do not agree with their life. But I think they should have the right to marry. I think each state should decide this, not the president.

Some states are Democrat. Some states are Republican. Democrat states like gay marriage. People who live there know this. If a state legalizes gay marriage, people there should respect that. They chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as other people. Each state should decide if they want to legalize gay marriage. 

I do not think the president should say no to gay marriage for the whole country. Gay marriage should be up to each state. The president does not live in every state. He should not tell states how to run their own lives. Maybe a new president will change the law.

Each state should decide about gay marriage. They are the ones who live there.

If the school sees something bad on Myspace, they have a right to see it. 

The school wants to keep students safe. They must stop bad things from happening. If looking at Myspace helps them do that, it is okay.

School officials should not look at Myspace just to find students doing bad things. But if they see something that makes them worried, it is okay. 

Parents want their children to be safe at school. Schools must be safe. After bad things happened, schools practiced drills. They did this to keep students safe.

The school officials did the same thing. They looked at Myspace to keep the school safe. They wanted to stop bad things like school shootings.

The war is bad.

We did not think much before we went to war. We did not have a plan. It did not work.

The people there fight with each other. We can not help them if they fight. We need to go home.

I do not like the people there. They fight all the time.

We did not know what would happen. War is different there. I think they want us to leave. 

We should leave. We were angry and want revenge. 

We should have a better plan. We did not know what to do.

The Catholic Church needs to make some changes. Its views on some things are old. Many people do not agree with the Church on things like gay marriage, birth control, and abortion. The Church has strong views on these topics. But these views make some people leave the Church. 

Some people do not like the Church's views on these things. They think the Church is wrong. For example, the Church is against abortion. 

People who want abortion might not want to be part of a church that says it is wrong. The same is true for gay marriage. People who support gay marriage might not want to be in a church that does not. 

I think the Church should allow women to be priests. I think priests should be able to marry. But I do not know if this would have stopped bad things from happening in the Church.  

The Church says priests are married to God. They give their life to God. But everyone else has a job and a family. I do not see why priests cannot have both.

I am not against gay marriage.  I think people are born this way.  It is not a choice.  Gay people should not be sad because of who they are. 

It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex cannot. I think this is bad.

I do not think the government should say what people can do.  It is not a law issue. It is not a bad thing.  Gay people should not be punished for who they are. 

People should be free to love who they want.

Gay marriage is good. Many people say it is bad. They say it hurts families. But gay people want the same things as straight people. They want to love and be loved. They want to build a life with someone. 

Gay people want the same rights as everyone else. If a person is sick, their partner should be able to visit them in the hospital.  Gay people should be able to share property and make health care decisions for each other.

Some people think gay marriage hurts children. But studies show that children of gay parents are just like other children. They are happy and healthy. 

Gay people are asking for a simple thing: the right to marry. This is a legal right, not a religious one. The government should not tell people what to believe. 

The government should treat everyone fairly. This means allowing gay people to marry.

I work in a hospital. I help give medicine to people. I see drugs every day. Some drugs are bad. Some drugs are good.  The law says some drugs are bad. But the law is not always right.

Some bad drugs are good for people. Doctors use them to help people.  Marijuana is bad. The law says it is bad. But it can help some people. It is good medicine.

Some people say marijuana is bad like alcohol. Alcohol is bad too. But people use it every day. Marijuana is not as bad as other drugs.  We need to think about marijuana in a new way.

We need to change how we see marijuana. It is not as bad as people think.  The law should change. Marijuana can be good medicine.

The church has changed. It is not as strict now. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a nice dress, shoes, and purse. 

I went to a private school. I saw my friends at church on weekends. Now, there is a special mass for teens. It is shorter. People dress more casually. In summer, people come in beach clothes. Families come in late.

Even at the morning mass, people wear jeans and khakis. 

I do not know much about church politics.

[About the bad things that priests have done, do you think the church could have stopped this?]

I do not think so. Some married men become bad. They like young children. Marriage does not stop this.

It is the person, not marriage. Priests choose to be priests. Some religions allow priests to marry. If a person wants to be married, they could join a different religion.

[Can you say more?]

I mean, the bad things. I think it is in a person's genes.

I do not think people choose to be bad. I think they are born this way.

Marriage cannot hide this.

The church may not have known about all of this.

[Do you have other thoughts about the church?]

No.

I start good with the plan. But, many people sad after the September 11th attacks. Our country went to Iraq. The Bush group said Iraq bad. They said Iraq had bad tools. This is not true.

The Bush group lied to the people. Colin Powell said he did not believe the proof. This is wrong. It is bad for a leader to lie.

The Bush group does not like the rules of the country. They want to make new rules.

I think the Bush group wanted war. They wanted to fight Iraq. 

The Bush group wanted to help our country get more energy. This is not fair.

The war in Iraq is long. It is bad to leave now. Iraq may fight each other.

Many countries want to help Iraq. This may be a bad idea. Iraq should be in charge of itself.

The leader of Iraq does not have power. Iraq has many groups that fight. The government is not strong.

It is not a real war. We did not say it was a war.

I do not like the war. It is not fair.

We use guns to show we are strong. But it is not a good reason.

We should help Iraq. But it is hard.

It is bad for our country.

Many people are hurting.

It is hard to say what to do.

I think it is not right to make this act legal. The state should not say it is legal. I think the churches should decide. The Constitution says to keep church and state separate. This is clear. 

Trying to make a law about this is wrong. It goes against what the Constitution says.  

Some people want to make this act illegal. This is unfair. Some churches do not like this act. But the government should not tell churches what to do.

Separation of church and state is important. It lets people have different beliefs. Making a law about this would be wrong. It would go against the Constitution. This law would hurt people, not help.

I do not think the government should be involved. The person who wants this law does not like this act. He does not like it because of his religion. 

It is up to the churches to decide. Not the president or the government. There is no good reason to make a law about this. I do not think it will help the country.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the real reason for war. They said the war was about the attacks on September 11th. This is not true. The government made people think this way to make them angry. They wanted to start the war. 

I do not like war. I do not like to start wars.  

The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government made the same mistakes. Many American soldiers died.

The government did not plan for what would happen after the war. They took away the Iraqi government. They did not know what to do next. They wanted to make Iraq a democracy. This is what they did in Vietnam. They wanted to stop communists. 

But this was hard. People did not want to be ruled by the United States.

The government should have known this would be hard.  They should have planned better.

The war is still going on. Many soldiers are still dying. The United States is still trying to help Iraq. It takes time to make a new government. 

The government made people think the war would be easy. This was not true.

The war is hard. We should not start wars.

I like gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a choice. It is part of who a person is. Some think it is a choice.  But now people see it is how a person is made.  It is not fair to take away rights from people because of this. It is not right. 

I think the government should not say what people can do. Marriage is between people. It is not the government's job. There are gay couples in my neighborhood. They are like other families. They walk dogs and do things like other families.

I have read that being gay is part of how a person is made. It may be in the brain.

Marriage is a private thing. People should be able to do what they want. If a man and a woman want to marry, they can. If two men or two women want to marry, they should be able to, too.

Think of the web like a big open space.

When you put things on the web, many people can see them.

If you write bad things, people will think bad things about you.

The school should not look at your web page.

But, if someone tells them about something bad, they must look.

They must keep everyone safe.

The war has gone on too long. At first, the goal was good. We wanted to help a country have a fair government. But now, I think we fight just to show we are strong. Maybe the reasons for starting the war were not good. President Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein before.

If the goal was to give people democracy, that is a good reason to fight. But I think the reason why we are still fighting is not clear. We started the war a long time ago. We did make a strong statement then.

Now, the war has lasted for many years. I think it should end.

The people in the country need to solve their own problems. We have spent a lot of money on the war. We need to use that money to help people in our own country. We have problems with poverty and need to fix our roads and schools.

Many people think the war was bad. The polls show this. People in the United States, Iraq, and the world think the war was a bad idea. Most U.S. troops in Iraq think the war was bad and we should leave.

The war was bad from the start. Leaving will also be bad. It is hard to do anything right in the Middle East.

The United States and Middle Eastern countries are very different. The United States wants to bring democracy to the Middle East. This is not the right way. People in the Middle East want to run their own lives.

Saddam Hussein was bad. But we should think about the good and bad before going to war with a country. We should not invade. The war is like quicksand. We cannot get out. I do not know what to say.

I do not see a reason to stay in Iraq. The government may have good reasons to stay. But I do not agree. We should leave. We could leave slowly over a year or more. But I think we should leave now.

Eighty percent of Iraqis want us to leave this year. Many want us to leave now. These are the people we are trying to help. They want us to leave.

If we ask them if we should leave, and they say yes, then it is not our fault if things go wrong.

We will not be good guys in the Middle East. But leaving is better than staying.

Yes, I think that men and women have different problems in the United States.

Women still face problems. This is true in many jobs.

Men have problems too. For example, men who stay at home with children are sometimes looked down on.

In some jobs, like fashion, men can face problems too.

People think that men in fashion do not know much about it.

I think that people should accept men and women in all jobs.

It is taking time, but we are making progress.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it not a crime. This is like a traffic ticket. You get a note. You do not go to jail. 

Some people worry about jobs. A ticket is still bad. It is on your record.

It costs a lot to put people in jail. It costs more to keep them there.

Some places have money problems. They do not want to spend money on jails. 

Denver is different. People there like marijuana. They think it is good to have money for schools and help for people.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not good for everyone. People should not drive after using it.

Marijuana is still bad in some places. People feel awkward about it.

Alcohol is bad for driving. Marijuana is bad for lives.

Different people react to drugs differently. Some use too much. Some use a little.

Yes.

Many things in the Catholic Church are old. They do the same things for a long time. 

It is good to have rules. But it is also good to change.

Some Catholics go to church every week. They follow the rules carefully. Sometimes I feel the Church does not like people who do not follow the rules. The Church does not like people who are not perfect Catholics. The Church does not like people of other religions.

My dad was an Episcopalian. My mom was a Catholic. The Church would not marry them. 

This is not kind to people of other religions. We learn to love others. But the Church does not love others. They say they love others, but they do not act that way.

The Church tells people to do things, but the Church does not always follow its own rules. The rules are old.

Some people think priests should be able to marry. I think this is a good idea. But it will not stop bad priests. Some priests hurt children.

People hurt children for many reasons. It is not about marriage.

I am not sure what I think about this big issue. It is hard to say if one side is right or wrong. This is a hard problem. It is about the church and the state. It is also about how we say what marriage is. This is hard because we do not want to hurt anyone's feelings.

I think all unions should be the same. I do not know if marriage should be defined by the government. Marriage is a religious thing. People do not get tax breaks for being baptized. The government does not watch them in a special way.

If you are married, the government should see it as a civil union. It is two people. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

Gay marriage is the same. Two people got a civil union.

All states should agree on a good answer. Then they can make it a law for all of the country.

It is not right to change the constitution to ban gay marriage. The constitution should not be changed for this. It is important to some people, but not enough to change the constitution. It is not that important.

I live in a Christian home. This makes me think about gay people. I have gay friends. I do not agree with their life. But I think they should have the right to marry. I think each state should decide this, not the president.

Some states are Democrat. Some states are Republican. Democrat states like gay marriage. People who live there know this. If a state legalizes gay marriage, people there should respect that. They chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as other people. Each state should decide if they want to legalize gay marriage. 

I do not think the president should say no to gay marriage for the whole country. Gay marriage should be up to each state. The president does not live in every state. He should not tell states how to run their own lives. Maybe a new president will change the law.

Each state should decide about gay marriage. They are the ones who live there.

Myspace is for the public. You can see what other people post. If you post on Myspace, you must know that others will see it.  School officials can see it too. They can see it at home.

If the school sees something bad on Myspace, they have a right to see it. 

The school wants to keep students safe. They must stop bad things from happening. If looking at Myspace helps them do that, it is okay.

School officials should not look at Myspace just to find students doing bad things. But if they see something that makes them worried, it is okay. 

Parents want their children to be safe at school. Schools must be safe. After bad things happened, schools practiced drills. They did this to keep students safe.

The school officials did the same thing. They looked at Myspace to keep the school safe. They wanted to stop bad things like school shootings.

The war is bad.

I was sad about nine eleven. I want the bad people to stop hurting us. At first, I want to fight them. Now I think it was a bad idea.

We did not think much before we went to war. We did not have a plan. It did not work.

The people there fight with each other. We can not help them if they fight. We need to go home.

I do not like the people there. They fight all the time.

We did not know what would happen. War is different there. I think they want us to leave. 

We should leave. We were angry and want revenge. 

We should have a better plan. We did not know what to do.

For example, the Church does not agree with gay marriage, abortion, or birth control. Some people do not agree with these views.  They think the Church should have new views.  If the Church changes, more people may stay. Some people are leaving the Church because of its views on these topics. If you believe in abortion, you may not want to be in a Church that says it is wrong.  The same is true for gay marriage. People may want to be in a Church that agrees with them. I am not against gay marriage. I think people are born gay. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be punished for who they are. It is wrong to say that only men and women can marry. 

I think it is wrong to say that gay people should not marry. They were born this way.  I was born straight. Other people are born gay. It is not a choice.

The government should not tell people who can marry. It is not a law or a moral problem.  The government should not tell people about their lives.  Gay people should not be punished for who they are.

Gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason to say no. Some think gay people hurt families. This is not true.  Gay love is like straight love. They are both strong. Gay people need the same rights as straight people.  

They want to share property. They want to make health care decisions. If a gay person is sick, their partner can not be with them in the hospital. This is not fair.

Many studies show gay couples are strong. They are happy. Gay marriage is like a marriage between a man and a woman.  

Gay people do not ask for a church wedding. They want a paper from the government. This paper says they are married.  The government should not mix with religion.

Some people say gay marriage is wrong because of their religion. This is not fair. The government should be fair to all people. 

Gay people are like everyone else. They want to have children. Some people worry about this. They worry about how children will grow up.  

But gay parents are good parents. They love their children.  Gay children are like all children. They deserve to be happy. Some children of gay parents are hurt by others. This is sad.  

The government should help all people. Gay marriage should be legal in all states.

The church should not cover up bad things. It is wrong. I do not think they always knew about the bad things.

For example, the Church does not agree with gay marriage, abortion, or birth control. Some people do not agree with these views.  They think the Church should have new views.  If the Church changes, more people may stay. Some people are leaving the Church because of its views on these topics. If you believe in abortion, you may not want to be in a Church that says it is wrong.  The same is true for gay marriage. People may want to be in a Church that agrees with them. I do not see why priests can't be married. The Church says priests are married to God. But, all people have jobs and families. Priests can have both.

I am not against gay marriage. I think people are born gay. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be punished for who they are. It is wrong to say that only men and women can marry. 

I think it is wrong to say that gay people should not marry. They were born this way.  I was born straight. Other people are born gay. It is not a choice.

The government should not tell people who can marry. It is not a law or a moral problem.  The government should not tell people about their lives.  Gay people should not be punished for who they are.

Gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason to say no. Some think gay people hurt families. This is not true.  Gay love is like straight love. They are both strong. Gay people need the same rights as straight people.  

They want to share property. They want to make health care decisions. If a gay person is sick, their partner can not be with them in the hospital. This is not fair.

Many studies show gay couples are strong. They are happy. Gay marriage is like a marriage between a man and a woman.  

Gay people do not ask for a church wedding. They want a paper from the government. This paper says they are married.  The government should not mix with religion.

Some people say gay marriage is wrong because of their religion. This is not fair. The government should be fair to all people. 

Gay people are like everyone else. They want to have children. Some people worry about this. They worry about how children will grow up.  

But gay parents are good parents. They love their children.  Gay children are like all children. They deserve to be happy. Some children of gay parents are hurt by others. This is sad.  

The government should help all people. Gay marriage should be legal in all states.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see good and bad things. Drugs can be bad. Some drugs are bad for you. But some drugs can help people. 

Some drugs are illegal. This does not mean they are all bad. Some illegal drugs are good for people. Doctors use them. 

Oxycotton and Vicodin are illegal. But doctors use them to help people. 

Marijuana is illegal. But it can be good for people. It can help with pain.

Alcohol is legal. But it can be bad if you use too much. Marijuana can also be bad if you use too much. 

We should think about marijuana carefully. We should not be afraid of it.

If marijuana is legal, people can use it safely. People need to understand that marijuana can be good for them.

The church has changed some. It is not as strict as before. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore nice dresses, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school. I saw my friends there on the weekends.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People wear casual clothes. Some wear beach clothes. Families run in late.

The morning masses are more casual now. People wear jeans and khakis. I used to dress up.

The biggest change is clothes. That is what I see. I do not know about church politics.

Regarding the bad things some priests have done, I do not think the church could have stopped them. Some married men become bad. They still like young children.

Marriage would not have stopped them. It is the person, not marriage.

Some religions allow priests to marry. If someone wants to be married and a priest, they should join a different church.

I think people are born that way. It is in their genes. It is not how they are raised.

The church should not cover up bad things. It is wrong. I do not think they always knew about the bad things.

I was ok with the idea at first.  But many people were sad about the September 11 attacks. We went to war in Iraq. The Bush group said the war was about Osama Bin Laden. They said Saddam Hussein had bad weapons. This is not true. This makes me angry.

We should help Iraq, but it is hard. Many people are sad.

We need to think about what is best for Iraq and the United States.

The war in Iraq is a difficult problem. We went there, and now it is hard to leave.

Women may have a hard time at work. There is a "glass ceiling."  This means that even when women are equal, some men find it hard to work for a woman. This is because of how people have always done things.

Making a new law about this would be wrong. It would be like the government controlling people instead of the other way around. 

The government should not be involved in this issue. 

The person who wants to make this illegal may be doing it because he does not like it. He may like one religion more than others.

It is up to the church to decide.

I do not think this law would help the country. It may even help.

The war in Iraq was hard. The government did not tell the people the full truth about why we went to war. They said the war was about the attacks on September 11th. This was not true. The government used the people's fear to start the war.  

I am against war. I do not like the idea of fighting first. The war in Iraq was like the war in Vietnam. The government did not learn from the past.

Many American soldiers died. They went to Iraq to change the government. 

The government was not ready for what happened after the war. There was a lot of trouble. The United States tried to make a new government, but this was hard.

The United States tried to do the same thing in Vietnam. They wanted to stop Communism. This was hard too. 

The war in Iraq will be a long fight. It is hard to win when you are fighting the people in a country.

The government should have planned better. They did not know it would be so hard. The war is still going on.

The war in Iraq is a difficult problem. We went there, and now it is hard to leave.

I am for gay marriage. I always have been. I think it is a personal choice. Many people say it is in your genes. This is not something people can control. To take away rights from people because of this is unfair. 

I think this is wrong. I want the government to stay out of this. It is a personal matter. It is about families. 

There are gay couples in my neighborhood. They are happy. They walk their dogs. They are like other families.

I do not like how some people want to control who can marry. Marriage is a personal thing. 

Many experts say that being gay is in your genes. It is not a choice. 

Gay marriage should be private. No one should have to tell anyone else.

The web is for every one.  What you put on the web is public.  It can be seen by many people.  

I am a Resident Assistant.  I have seen this.  If you say bad things on the web, it can hurt you.  People will think bad things about you.  If you say you want to hurt people, someone will tell.

The web is seen by many.  If your friend sees it, they will tell the school.  The school must act.  They must keep people safe.

It is hard to know what is real on the web.  Some people joke.  But some jokes can be bad.

A friend saw some things on Facebook.  He was worried.  The things were not funny.

When you put things on the web, it is not a secret.  If you do not want people to see it, do not put it on the web.

The war has gone on for too long. At first, the goal was good. The goal was to help people have a fair government. But now, I think we are fighting for other reasons. Maybe we want to show we are strong. 

I think the reasons for the war were not good at the start. The president's father had problems with Saddam Hussein. 

If the goal was to help people have a fair government, that is good. But if there were other reasons, it was not fair. 

We showed our power when we started the war. But it has been many years. This is too long. 

If our goal was to help people who did not have a fair government, that is a good reason to fight. But now our reasons are unclear. It seems like we are fighting just to keep fighting. 

We need to end the war. The people there must take care of themselves. We have spent too much money on this war. We need to use the money for our own problems, like poverty. 

We have many problems at home. We need to spend money on schools, roads, and health care. It is wrong to spend money on war when we have so many problems at home.

Can you tell me more? I want to know why someone could not have a Myspace.

It is good that someone saw the bad plan. They saved a life. 

Not all people are bad. It is not right to look at everyone's Myspace. 

I use Facebook. It makes me sad that bad people can see my things.

Bad people want to know about you. They can find your name, your school, and your friends. They can ask to meet you.

I only talk to people I know on Facebook. I try to keep my things private. 

It is hard to use Facebook. You want to talk to your friends, but it is not safe.


My friend told me her high school banned Myspace. I do not know if that is right.

We talk about the Iraq War.  I feel bad to talk about it. Many people say they were against it. I was too.  It is not important now. Most people think the war was bad.  

This is true for the United States, Iraq, and the world.  Many U.S. soldiers think the war was bad. They want to go home. 

The war has been bad from the start.  It will be bad to leave. The Middle East is hard to understand.

The United States and the Middle East are very different. The United States wants to bring democracy to the Middle East. This is not good.

Saddam was a bad man.  But we should not invade a country.  This makes things worse. We are stuck in Iraq.

I do not know why we should stay.  The government has ideas. I do not agree.  

They say we should leave slowly. Maybe this is okay.  I want us to leave now. 

Most Iraqis want us to leave. They know what is best.  If we ask them, they will say yes.  Then we are not to blame if things go wrong. 

We will never be good guys in the Middle East.  But leaving is better than staying.

Yes, I think gender is still a problem in the United States. It is not only a problem for women. It is a problem for men too.

Women may have a hard time at work. There is a "glass ceiling."  This means that even when women are equal, some men find it hard to work for a woman. This is because of how people have always done things.

Women may have the skills for a job. But a board may not choose her because she is a woman. People think women are not good at business.

The same thing can happen to men. For example, it is not usual for men to stay home with children. Some people think this is wrong. They think men should work and make money.

In the fashion world, some people may not take a man seriously if he is straight.  This is because people think fashion is for women.

In many jobs, there is still gender discrimination. To change this is hard. People have old ideas. Things are better now than they were long ago, but change is slow.

Women are getting better jobs. More women are CEOs.  More people accept this. More men stay home with their children. This is good.

We must show the good qualities of people who are different. We must not be too pushy. If we force change, people will resist. Change is happening. 

People may also be discriminated against because of where they are from. Sometimes people judge others by their grammar. This is not fair.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it less bad. It is not a crime now. It is more like a traffic ticket. You get a fine. This is good for jobs. When people have a drug charge, it is hard to get a job. 

Some people think that decriminalization is not enough. They worry about the future. Even if it is not a crime, it can still be hard to get jobs and do other things. 

It costs a lot of money to arrest people. It costs money to keep them in jail. It costs money for lawyers. Denver is a city that is open to new ideas. They think it is good to save money. They can use the money for schools and help for old people. 

Marijuana is still not good for everyone. Some people think it is bad for your health. Some people think it is bad for society. 

Marijuana is still not legal like alcohol. People do not use it in public much. Some people think this is good. 

Alcohol is bad for your body. Marijuana is bad for your life. Everyone is different. Some people can use things like marijuana and alcohol safely. Other people can't.

Yes, I would say yes. The Church has old ways. It is good to keep some old ways. But it is also good to change. Some Catholics must go to Church every week. The Church has strong rules. Sometimes, I think the Church looks down on people who do not follow all the rules. The Church does not like people who are not perfect Catholics. The Church does not like people of other religions. 

My father was not Catholic. My mother was Catholic. The Church would not marry them. This is not being nice to other religions. We learn to love all people. This is a Catholic teaching. But it is wrong to say love others and then not accept them.

The Church tells people to do things. But the way the Church acts is different. The Church is old. They keep the old ways.

I think priests should be able to marry. But this will not stop bad people. Bad people will do bad things.

I do not think allowing priests to marry will stop bad people from hurting children.

This is a hard subject. I am not sure what I think. I think it is a hard problem for many people. The law must keep church and state separate.  Marriage is a big idea. It must be clear for all.

Some people think the government should say what is a marriage. Some people think it is a church idea.  The government does not say what religion to have. The government does not say if people are baptized.  If you are married, the government should see it as a civil union.  It is two people.  

If all states agree, it should be a law for all states.  It is wrong to change the Constitution to say no to gay marriage.  The Constitution is for big ideas.  This is a big idea for some people, but not big enough to change the Constitution.

I grew up in a home with Christian beliefs.  I have many gay friends. 

I do not agree with this life. But I think it should be legal. It is not a big issue for the country. Each state should decide.

Some states are democratic. Some are republican. Democratic states want gay marriage. People in these states know how the state feels.

If you live in a state that legalizes gay marriage, you know the state's view. You chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people.  

I think gay marriage should be legal in each state.

I do not think the president should say all states must ban gay marriage. Each state should decide.

The president does not live in every state. He should not tell states what to do.

Some things are better left to each state. The president will not be in office forever.

A new president may change the law. It is better to let each state decide. They live there.

Myspace is for the public. People can see what you put there. If you put things on the internet, you must know people will see them. This includes school officials.  

School officials have the right to see what students post on Myspace. They can see it even at home. They want to keep students safe.  

It is good to be safe. If the school sees something bad on Myspace, they can help. They can stop a bad thing from happening.

It is wrong to go on Myspace just to look for bad things. But if the school sees something that helps them keep students safe, that is okay. 

Parents want their children to be safe at school. Schools do many things to keep students safe. They practice for bad things. They do this to help keep students safe from bad things like school shootings. 

School officials want to keep students safe.

Nine eleven changed me. I want to fight back. I was for the war at first. I felt angry. I did not think about the long time. We went to war without a plan. It was a bad idea.

Now, I am against the war. I do not think it is working. The people there fight each other. They will not be our friends.

We went there unprepared. We did not know what to expect. War is very different there. They are savage. I think they just want us to leave. 

We should leave. We were angry. We did not think clearly.  We wanted revenge. The President wanted to go to war.

We had to do something after nine eleven. But we should have had a better plan. We did not know what to do. We were not united.

We cannot change them. They are always going to be like this. We are hurting ourselves by staying. We should leave.
