transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs some changes. 

Many people are leaving the Church. They do not like some Church views. 

The Church is against gay marriage and abortion. The Church also wants people to use birth control less. 

These are old ideas. Some people think the Church should change. 

Many people disagree with the Church on these things. They think the Church is wrong. 

For example, if a person wants an abortion, they may not like the Church's view. 

The same is true for gay marriage. 

I think women can be priests. I think priests can be married. This may help the Church.  

But I do not know if these changes would stop bad things from happening. 

I think priests should have families. They work hard, like everyone else. They need family too.

I am not against gay marriage. I think people are born this way. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be bad for being gay. 

It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can marry but two people of the same sex can not. I do not think the government should tell people who they can marry.

It is not a choice to be gay or straight. A person is born this way. Gay people should not be punished for who they are.

Gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason to say no. Some people think gay couples are bad for families. This is wrong. Gay and straight families are different, but they can both be good. Gay marriage is like two sides of the same coin. They are different, but they are both the same thing. Gay couples need the same rights as straight couples. 

This means they should have the same rights for taxes and health care. If a gay person is sick, their partner should be able to visit them in the hospital.  Many studies show that gay couples are happy. They have the same kind of love and support as straight couples. 

Gay people are not asking to marry in a church. They want a legal marriage from the government. The government should not mix with religion. The government should not stop people from getting married just because a church says no.

Some people worry about gay couples having children. They worry about how children will be treated. This is a problem, but it is not a reason to ban gay marriage.  Children need love and support. Gay parents can give this to their children. 

The government should help all people.  The government should make gay marriage legal in every state.

I work in a hospital. I work in the pharmacy. Some drugs are bad. They are illegal. Some drugs are good. They help people.

Marijuana is illegal. But it can help people. The people in the hospital use pills that are also illegal. These pills are good. They help people.

We should use marijuana to help people. We should not be afraid of it. It is not like alcohol. Alcohol can be bad. But marijuana is not as bad.

Marijuana should be legal. But we should be careful. It should not be easy to get. People should learn to use it well.

People think marijuana is bad. It is not as bad as other drugs. We should not think of it as bad. We should think of it as a way to help people.

The church has changed in the twenty-first century. It is not as strict. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school. I saw my friends there on the weekends. Now, there is a mass for teenagers. It is thirty minutes. People dress more casually. In the summer, people come in beach clothes. Families come late. I think the church is more casual now. People wear jeans and khakis to morning mass.

I do not know about the church's politics. I do not know if these things could have been avoided. Men who are married can also become pedophiles. I think a person's choice is their own. There are other religions where priests can be married. If they want to be married, they should try a different religion.

I think pedophilia is a genetic thing. People are born that way. It is not about how they are raised. You cannot hide it with marriage. I think the church could not have stopped this. If they knew and covered it up, that is bad. I do not think they always knew.

I did not like the war in Iraq. Many people were sad after the attacks on September 11. The Bush group said the war was because of Osama Bin Laden. They said Iraq had bad weapons. This was not true. The Bush group lied to the people. Even Colin Powell said he was not sure of the proof. This is very bad.

The Bush group did not like the rules of the country. They wanted to go to war. The Bush group wanted to hurt Saddam Hussein. His father was in charge before. They also wanted more oil. 

The war has gone on too long. It is hard to leave now. Iraq might fight itself. The United Nations wants other countries to help. This might cause new problems.

Iraq is not strong. Its leaders fight each other. The group that fights with us is now in charge. Iraq is very hard to fix.

I talk about the war in Iraq. I do not like the war. It is not a real war.  We did not tell Congress we would go to war.  We went to war because Iraq did bad things. They hurt us on nine eleven. I do not like the war. I do not know much about it. 

We are in Iraq to make a democracy. We want to get oil from Iraq. But the war makes people sad. We should not stay in Iraq. The people there want to make their own country.  

It is hard to say what to do. We must help the people in Iraq. But we waste money on the war.  The President is sad because the war is bad for him. The war is like the Vietnam War. It is a bad war. 

Some people in Iraq are sad. Their sons and daughters are in the war. 

It is hard to say if we should leave. We must help the people in Iraq. But we must not change their way of life. If we stay, they will hate us more. 

I think the war will go on for a long time.

I think it is not right for the state to make this legal. The Constitution says that there is a separation of church and state. This means the people and the government should be separate.  

Many churches are against this.  The government should not tell churches what is legal or not legal. 

The Constitution protects religious freedom. It is wrong to change the Constitution to say that this is illegal. This would be the first time an amendment is used to stop people from doing something. 

The government should not be involved in this issue. The president wants to stop this because it goes against his beliefs. He wants to pick one religion over others.

Churches should decide what is right for them.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the truth about why we went to war. They said the war was about the attacks on September 11th. But the war was not about September 11th. The government made people scared and angry. They used this to start the war.

I do not like war. I think it is wrong to start a war before being attacked. This war is like the Vietnam War. The government made the same mistakes. Many American soldiers died. 

The government did not know what would happen after the war. They did not know that there would be so much chaos.

The government removed the Iraqi government. They wanted to make Iraq a democracy. This is like what they tried to do in Vietnam. They wanted to stop communism. But it is hard to make a new government work.

The war will be long and hard. There are many people who do not want us there. It is hard to fight against people who are not in a real army. It is hard to fight against your own people.

The government should have been more ready for this war. They should have thought about all the problems. The war is still going on. Many American soldiers are still dying. We are still trying to teach Iraqis to run their own country.

The government did not tell the people the truth about the war. They made it seem easy.

We should not have gone to war. But now we are there. It is hard to leave. We cannot abandon the Iraqi people.

We need to think about how many soldiers have died. How many more will die? Is it worth it to fight for a free Iraq?

If we want to make Iraq a democracy, why not try to do this in other countries too? I think the war is about oil. This is why we are in Iraq. 

We said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. But we never found them. We know North Korea has weapons of mass destruction, but we are not fighting them. I do not think the government is telling the truth.

I hope the war ends soon. I hope there will be peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a choice people make. It seems to be more about how a person is made, not how they grow up. To take away rights from people for something they cannot control is not fair. It is unkind. 

I am for gay marriage. I think the government should not tell people who they can marry. It is a private matter. It is about two people. 

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like other families. They walk their dogs, raise children. They should be able to marry. 

Some people think the government should decide what marriage is. They try to say it is against God. I think this is wrong.

Some people say that being gay is a choice. But I think it is how a person is born. It is not a choice.

Marriage is a private matter. People should be able to marry who they love without government rules.

When you put things on the web, it is for every body to see. You can not take it back. 

I am a resident assistant. I see this all the time. If you put bad things on the web, people will think you are bad. If you talk about hurting people, someone will tell the school. The school must act. They can not let bad things happen.

Some people joke on the web. But the school must be sure. They do not know if a joke is real or not. 

The school got a message about a student. They found the message on the web. The student's friend saw bad things on the web. The friend told the school. The school had to help.

When you put things on the web, people can see them. If you do not want people to see, do not put it on the web.

The school must keep students safe. They must look at the web if they hear about danger.

School officials should not look at students' web pages without their permission. But if someone tells the school about danger, they must look.

Teachers should not pretend to be students on the web. This is wrong.

The war has gone on for much time. At first, the war had a good reason. It was to help people have fair government.

But now, it seems like we fight just to show we are strong.  

I think the reasons for the war may have been bad. President Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein. This may have made the reason for the war bad.

If the reason was to help people have fair government, that is good. But if it was for other reasons, that is not fair.

The war started fast. It seemed like we showed our power. But it has gone on too long.

We should help people have fair government. This is a good reason for war. But now the reason is not clear. We fight just to fight.

We need to stop the war. The people in that country must take care of themselves. We spend too much money on the war. We need money for our own problems like poverty. We need money for schools and roads.

We need to help people in our own country. We should not spend money on war.

I have a question.

Someone saw some bad things on Myspace.

It stopped a bad thing from happening.

This is good.

But is it right to look at people’s pages?

A person can not look at all the pages all day.

It is bad to look at pages just to find bad things.

What if a person is looking for bad things?

I do not have Myspace.

I have Facebook.

It is scary that people can see things about me.

I saw on TV that a man got a girl’s name.

He talked to her on the computer.

He met her in a few minutes.

I would not meet someone like that.

People talk to me on Facebook that I do not know.

They know things about me.

They know my class times.

They know my friends.

They know lots of things.

I try not to put too many things on Facebook.

But I like to talk to my friends.

It is hard to know who to trust.

My roommate said her school stopped students from having Myspace.

I do not know if this is right.

I do not like the Iraq War. Many people think it was a bad idea. This is true in the United States, Iraq, and the world. Most people think we should go home.

The war was bad from the start. Going home will be bad too. The Middle East is hard. The United States and the Middle East are very different. Some people in the United States think we can bring democracy to the Middle East. This is not true.

Saddam Hussein was bad. But we should think about the bad things before we go to war. The war in Iraq is a big problem.

We should go home. The Iraqi people want us to go. We should listen to them. If we go home, maybe things will be better.

Yes, I see gender issues in the United States. It is not just a woman's problem. It is a problem in many jobs. Women face a glass roof. This means even though there should be equal chance, men have a hard time taking orders from a woman. This is because of how society has been for a long time. Women may have the skills for a job, but they may not get it. This is because people think women are not good leaders. Men also face issues. For example, in some jobs, men who stay home with children are looked down on. Society thinks men should work and be the money maker. It is hard for men who want to stay home. In the fashion industry, straight men may not be taken seriously. This is because people think fashion is for women. They may not think men know much about fashion.

I think there is gender discrimination in many jobs. It is hard to change because society has a way of thinking. We have come a long way, but change is slow. More women are becoming leaders. More men are staying home. People are starting to accept these things. We need to show the good qualities of people who are often judged. We cannot be too pushy. If we push too hard, people will resist. We are making progress. Change takes time.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it less serious. It was not a crime. It was like a traffic ticket. People get a notice, not arrested. 

Some people worry about jobs. They worry about what people think about having a marijuana charge. This is true even if the charge is not a crime.

It cost much money to arrest, jail, and put people in court. This cost money for the city. 

Some cities do not have much money. They do not want to spend money on marijuana. Even if it would save money. 

Denver is a city that is open to change. They have more money now. They can use it for schools, old people, and homeless people.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It can be bad. But there are money reasons to make it less serious.

If marijuana is legal, it could be sold like cigarettes. People could smoke it everywhere. This could be bad. 

Many people think smoking marijuana is wrong. 

Alcohol is bad for driving. Marijuana can be bad for how people live their lives.

Everyone reacts to things differently. Some people use things in a bad way.

I think yes. Many things the Church does are old. They have done them for a long time. It is good to have strong beliefs. But it is also good to change when things need to change. 

Many Catholics go to Church every week. They have rules about how things should be done. Sometimes, I feel the Church looks down on people who do not follow the rules exactly. The Church does not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They do not accept people of other religions.

My dad was not Catholic. My mom was Catholic. The Church would not let them marry. This is not being kind to other religions. We learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching. But it is wrong to say you love others and then not accept them.

The Church tells people to do good things. But the way the Church acts is not always good. It is old and should change.

I think it would be good if priests could marry. This would not stop bad things from happening. Bad people might do bad things even if they are married.

I am not sure what I think about this problem. I can not say if one side is right or wrong.

This is a hard problem. It is hard to talk about church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is.

I think all people should have the right to join in a civil union. I do not know if marriage should be the same as a civil union.

The government should not say what kind of marriage people have. The government does not say what kind of religion people have.

If two people join in a civil union, the government should treat them the same. They should not look at what kind of marriage it was.

I think all states should agree on the same rules. Then they can make a law for all of the United States.

I think it is wrong to change the Constitution to ban gay marriage. This is a big problem for some people. But it is not a big enough problem to change the Constitution.

I grew up in a home with Christian beliefs.  Homosexuality is hard for me to think about. I have many gay friends. I do not like the way they live. But I think they should be able to marry.

I think each state should make its own rules about gay marriage. Not the president. Many states are run by Democrats. Many states are run by Republicans. Democrats like gay marriage. Republicans do not. If you live in a state that wants gay marriage, you should accept it. You chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. This is why I think states should decide about gay marriage.

I do not agree with President Bush. He says all states must be against gay marriage. He does not live in every state. He should not tell states what to do.

A new president may come soon. A Democrat may want to allow gay marriage. This will cause problems. It is better if states make their own rules.

Myspace is for the public. It is like a bulletin board. You post things for all to see.

If you post on the internet, people will see it. This includes school people.

The school has a job to keep students safe. They can see Myspace posts. They can see this even at home.

If the school sees something bad on Myspace, they have the right to see it. They want to stop bad things from happening.

Like when schools practice drills for safety, the school looks out for the students. They do this to stop bad things like school shootings.

It is not wrong if school people look at Myspace to keep the school safe.

The big war, it was after nine eleven. I was sad. I want to fight back. I want to hurt them like they hurt us.

But now I think we made a mistake. We were angry. We did not think. We went to war without a plan.

The war was bad for us. The people there fight with each other. They do not fight with us. We can not make them better.

We should leave. The people there need to fix their own problems.

We went to war without knowing what to do. War is different there. They fight in a bad way. They do not want to make their country better. They want us to leave.

We should leave. We were angry. We want revenge. The president said we had to fight. He did this because the people wanted it.

We should have thought more. We should have had a plan. We did not know what to do. We did not work together.

We went to war because we were angry. We made them angry. They will always be the same.

We should leave. We are not helping. We are hurting ourselves.

transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs some changes. 

Many people are leaving the Church. They do not like some Church views. 

The Church is against gay marriage and abortion. The Church also wants people to use birth control less. 

These are old ideas. Some people think the Church should change. 

Many people disagree with the Church on these things. They think the Church is wrong. 

For example, if a person wants an abortion, they may not like the Church's view. 

The same is true for gay marriage. 

I think women can be priests. I think priests can be married. This may help the Church.  

But I do not know if these changes would stop bad things from happening. 

I think priests should have families. They work hard, like everyone else. They need family too.

I am not against gay marriage. I think people are born this way. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be bad for being gay. 

It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can marry but two people of the same sex can not. I do not think the government should tell people who they can marry.

It is not a choice to be gay or straight. A person is born this way. Gay people should not be punished for who they are.

Gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason to say no. Some people think gay couples are bad for families. This is wrong. Gay and straight families are different, but they can both be good. Gay marriage is like two sides of the same coin. They are different, but they are both the same thing. Gay couples need the same rights as straight couples. 

This means they should have the same rights for taxes and health care. If a gay person is sick, their partner should be able to visit them in the hospital.  Many studies show that gay couples are happy. They have the same kind of love and support as straight couples. 

Gay people are not asking to marry in a church. They want a legal marriage from the government. The government should not mix with religion. The government should not stop people from getting married just because a church says no.

Some people worry about gay couples having children. They worry about how children will be treated. This is a problem, but it is not a reason to ban gay marriage.  Children need love and support. Gay parents can give this to their children. 

The government should help all people.  The government should make gay marriage legal in every state.

I work in a hospital. I work in the pharmacy. Some drugs are bad. They are illegal. Some drugs are good. They help people.

Marijuana is illegal. But it can help people. The people in the hospital use pills that are also illegal. These pills are good. They help people.

We should use marijuana to help people. We should not be afraid of it. It is not like alcohol. Alcohol can be bad. But marijuana is not as bad.

Marijuana should be legal. But we should be careful. It should not be easy to get. People should learn to use it well.

People think marijuana is bad. It is not as bad as other drugs. We should not think of it as bad. We should think of it as a way to help people.

The church has changed in the twenty-first century. It is not as strict. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school. I saw my friends there on the weekends. Now, there is a mass for teenagers. It is thirty minutes. People dress more casually. In the summer, people come in beach clothes. Families come late. I think the church is more casual now. People wear jeans and khakis to morning mass.

I do not know about the church's politics. I do not know if these things could have been avoided. Men who are married can also become pedophiles. I think a person's choice is their own. There are other religions where priests can be married. If they want to be married, they should try a different religion.

I think pedophilia is a genetic thing. People are born that way. It is not about how they are raised. You cannot hide it with marriage. I think the church could not have stopped this. If they knew and covered it up, that is bad. I do not think they always knew.

I did not like the war in Iraq. Many people were sad after the attacks on September 11. The Bush group said the war was because of Osama Bin Laden. They said Iraq had bad weapons. This was not true. The Bush group lied to the people. Even Colin Powell said he was not sure of the proof. This is very bad.

The Bush group did not like the rules of the country. They wanted to go to war. The Bush group wanted to hurt Saddam Hussein. His father was in charge before. They also wanted more oil. 

The war has gone on too long. It is hard to leave now. Iraq might fight itself. The United Nations wants other countries to help. This might cause new problems.

Iraq is not strong. Its leaders fight each other. The group that fights with us is now in charge. Iraq is very hard to fix.

I talk about the war in Iraq. I do not like the war. It is not a real war.  We did not tell Congress we would go to war.  We went to war because Iraq did bad things. They hurt us on nine eleven. I do not like the war. I do not know much about it. 

We are in Iraq to make a democracy. We want to get oil from Iraq. But the war makes people sad. We should not stay in Iraq. The people there want to make their own country.  

It is hard to say what to do. We must help the people in Iraq. But we waste money on the war.  The President is sad because the war is bad for him. The war is like the Vietnam War. It is a bad war. 

Some people in Iraq are sad. Their sons and daughters are in the war. 

It is hard to say if we should leave. We must help the people in Iraq. But we must not change their way of life. If we stay, they will hate us more. 

I think the war will go on for a long time.

I think it is not right for the state to make this legal. The Constitution says that there is a separation of church and state. This means the people and the government should be separate.  

Many churches are against this.  The government should not tell churches what is legal or not legal. 

The Constitution protects religious freedom. It is wrong to change the Constitution to say that this is illegal. This would be the first time an amendment is used to stop people from doing something. 

The government should not be involved in this issue. The president wants to stop this because it goes against his beliefs. He wants to pick one religion over others.

Churches should decide what is right for them.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the truth about why we went to war. They said the war was about the attacks on September 11th. But the war was not about September 11th. The government made people scared and angry. They used this to start the war.

I do not like war. I think it is wrong to start a war before being attacked. This war is like the Vietnam War. The government made the same mistakes. Many American soldiers died. 

The government did not know what would happen after the war. They did not know that there would be so much chaos.

The government removed the Iraqi government. They wanted to make Iraq a democracy. This is like what they tried to do in Vietnam. They wanted to stop communism. But it is hard to make a new government work.

The war will be long and hard. There are many people who do not want us there. It is hard to fight against people who are not in a real army. It is hard to fight against your own people.

The government should have been more ready for this war. They should have thought about all the problems. The war is still going on. Many American soldiers are still dying. We are still trying to teach Iraqis to run their own country.

The government did not tell the people the truth about the war. They made it seem easy.

We should not have gone to war. But now we are there. It is hard to leave. We cannot abandon the Iraqi people.

We need to think about how many soldiers have died. How many more will die? Is it worth it to fight for a free Iraq?

If we want to make Iraq a democracy, why not try to do this in other countries too? I think the war is about oil. This is why we are in Iraq. 

We said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. But we never found them. We know North Korea has weapons of mass destruction, but we are not fighting them. I do not think the government is telling the truth.

I hope the war ends soon. I hope there will be peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a choice people make. It seems to be more about how a person is made, not how they grow up. To take away rights from people for something they cannot control is not fair. It is unkind. 

I am for gay marriage. I think the government should not tell people who they can marry. It is a private matter. It is about two people. 

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like other families. They walk their dogs, raise children. They should be able to marry. 

Some people think the government should decide what marriage is. They try to say it is against God. I think this is wrong.

Some people say that being gay is a choice. But I think it is how a person is born. It is not a choice.

Marriage is a private matter. People should be able to marry who they love without government rules.

When you put things on the web, it is for every body to see. You can not take it back. 

I am a resident assistant. I see this all the time. If you put bad things on the web, people will think you are bad. If you talk about hurting people, someone will tell the school. The school must act. They can not let bad things happen.

Some people joke on the web. But the school must be sure. They do not know if a joke is real or not. 

The school got a message about a student. They found the message on the web. The student's friend saw bad things on the web. The friend told the school. The school had to help.

When you put things on the web, people can see them. If you do not want people to see, do not put it on the web.

The school must keep students safe. They must look at the web if they hear about danger.

School officials should not look at students' web pages without their permission. But if someone tells the school about danger, they must look.

Teachers should not pretend to be students on the web. This is wrong.

The war has gone on for much time. At first, the war had a good reason. It was to help people have fair government.

But now, it seems like we fight just to show we are strong.  

I think the reasons for the war may have been bad. President Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein. This may have made the reason for the war bad.

If the reason was to help people have fair government, that is good. But if it was for other reasons, that is not fair.

The war started fast. It seemed like we showed our power. But it has gone on too long.

We should help people have fair government. This is a good reason for war. But now the reason is not clear. We fight just to fight.

We need to stop the war. The people in that country must take care of themselves. We spend too much money on the war. We need money for our own problems like poverty. We need money for schools and roads.

We need to help people in our own country. We should not spend money on war.

I have a question.

Someone saw some bad things on Myspace.

It stopped a bad thing from happening.

This is good.

But is it right to look at people’s pages?

A person can not look at all the pages all day.

It is bad to look at pages just to find bad things.

What if a person is looking for bad things?

I do not have Myspace.

I have Facebook.

It is scary that people can see things about me.

I saw on TV that a man got a girl’s name.

He talked to her on the computer.

He met her in a few minutes.

I would not meet someone like that.

People talk to me on Facebook that I do not know.

They know things about me.

They know my class times.

They know my friends.

They know lots of things.

I try not to put too many things on Facebook.

But I like to talk to my friends.

It is hard to know who to trust.

My roommate said her school stopped students from having Myspace.

I do not know if this is right.

I do not like the Iraq War. Many people think it was a bad idea. This is true in the United States, Iraq, and the world. Most people think we should go home.

The war was bad from the start. Going home will be bad too. The Middle East is hard. The United States and the Middle East are very different. Some people in the United States think we can bring democracy to the Middle East. This is not true.

Saddam Hussein was bad. But we should think about the bad things before we go to war. The war in Iraq is a big problem.

We should go home. The Iraqi people want us to go. We should listen to them. If we go home, maybe things will be better.

Yes, I see gender issues in the United States. It is not just a woman's problem. It is a problem in many jobs. Women face a glass roof. This means even though there should be equal chance, men have a hard time taking orders from a woman. This is because of how society has been for a long time. Women may have the skills for a job, but they may not get it. This is because people think women are not good leaders. Men also face issues. For example, in some jobs, men who stay home with children are looked down on. Society thinks men should work and be the money maker. It is hard for men who want to stay home. In the fashion industry, straight men may not be taken seriously. This is because people think fashion is for women. They may not think men know much about fashion.

I think there is gender discrimination in many jobs. It is hard to change because society has a way of thinking. We have come a long way, but change is slow. More women are becoming leaders. More men are staying home. People are starting to accept these things. We need to show the good qualities of people who are often judged. We cannot be too pushy. If we push too hard, people will resist. We are making progress. Change takes time.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it less serious. It was not a crime. It was like a traffic ticket. People get a notice, not arrested. 

Some people worry about jobs. They worry about what people think about having a marijuana charge. This is true even if the charge is not a crime.

It cost much money to arrest, jail, and put people in court. This cost money for the city. 

Some cities do not have much money. They do not want to spend money on marijuana. Even if it would save money. 

Denver is a city that is open to change. They have more money now. They can use it for schools, old people, and homeless people.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It can be bad. But there are money reasons to make it less serious.

If marijuana is legal, it could be sold like cigarettes. People could smoke it everywhere. This could be bad. 

Many people think smoking marijuana is wrong. 

Alcohol is bad for driving. Marijuana can be bad for how people live their lives.

Everyone reacts to things differently. Some people use things in a bad way.

I think yes. Many things the Church does are old. They have done them for a long time. It is good to have strong beliefs. But it is also good to change when things need to change. 

Many Catholics go to Church every week. They have rules about how things should be done. Sometimes, I feel the Church looks down on people who do not follow the rules exactly. The Church does not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They do not accept people of other religions.

My dad was not Catholic. My mom was Catholic. The Church would not let them marry. This is not being kind to other religions. We learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching. But it is wrong to say you love others and then not accept them.

The Church tells people to do good things. But the way the Church acts is not always good. It is old and should change.

I think it would be good if priests could marry. This would not stop bad things from happening. Bad people might do bad things even if they are married.

I am not sure what I think about this problem. I can not say if one side is right or wrong.

This is a hard problem. It is hard to talk about church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is.

I think all people should have the right to join in a civil union. I do not know if marriage should be the same as a civil union.

The government should not say what kind of marriage people have. The government does not say what kind of religion people have.

If two people join in a civil union, the government should treat them the same. They should not look at what kind of marriage it was.

I think all states should agree on the same rules. Then they can make a law for all of the United States.

I think it is wrong to change the Constitution to ban gay marriage. This is a big problem for some people. But it is not a big enough problem to change the Constitution.

I grew up in a home with Christian beliefs.  Homosexuality is hard for me to think about. I have many gay friends. I do not like the way they live. But I think they should be able to marry.

I think each state should make its own rules about gay marriage. Not the president. Many states are run by Democrats. Many states are run by Republicans. Democrats like gay marriage. Republicans do not. If you live in a state that wants gay marriage, you should accept it. You chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. This is why I think states should decide about gay marriage.

I do not agree with President Bush. He says all states must be against gay marriage. He does not live in every state. He should not tell states what to do.

A new president may come soon. A Democrat may want to allow gay marriage. This will cause problems. It is better if states make their own rules.

Myspace is for the public. It is like a bulletin board. You post things for all to see.

If you post on the internet, people will see it. This includes school people.

The school has a job to keep students safe. They can see Myspace posts. They can see this even at home.

If the school sees something bad on Myspace, they have the right to see it. They want to stop bad things from happening.

Like when schools practice drills for safety, the school looks out for the students. They do this to stop bad things like school shootings.

It is not wrong if school people look at Myspace to keep the school safe.

The big war, it was after nine eleven. I was sad. I want to fight back. I want to hurt them like they hurt us.

But now I think we made a mistake. We were angry. We did not think. We went to war without a plan.

The war was bad for us. The people there fight with each other. They do not fight with us. We can not make them better.

We should leave. The people there need to fix their own problems.

We went to war without knowing what to do. War is different there. They fight in a bad way. They do not want to make their country better. They want us to leave.

We should leave. We were angry. We want revenge. The president said we had to fight. He did this because the people wanted it.

We should have thought more. We should have had a plan. We did not know what to do. We did not work together.

We went to war because we were angry. We made them angry. They will always be the same.

We should leave. We are not helping. We are hurting ourselves.

But not enough to stay in there

transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs some changes. 

Many people are leaving the Church. They do not like some Church views. 

The Church is against gay marriage and abortion. The Church also wants people to use birth control less. 

These are old ideas. Some people think the Church should change. 

Many people disagree with the Church on these things. They think the Church is wrong. 

For example, if a person wants an abortion, they may not like the Church's view. 

The same is true for gay marriage. 

I think women can be priests. I think priests can be married. This may help the Church.  

But I do not know if these changes would stop bad things from happening. 

I think priests should have families. They work hard, like everyone else. They need family too.

I am not against gay marriage. I think people are born this way. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be bad for being gay. 

It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can marry but two people of the same sex can not. I do not think the government should tell people who they can marry.

It is not a choice to be gay or straight. A person is born this way. Gay people should not be punished for who they are.

Gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason to say no. Some people think gay couples are bad for families. This is wrong. Gay and straight families are different, but they can both be good. Gay marriage is like two sides of the same coin. They are different, but they are both the same thing. Gay couples need the same rights as straight couples. 

This means they should have the same rights for taxes and health care. If a gay person is sick, their partner should be able to visit them in the hospital.  Many studies show that gay couples are happy. They have the same kind of love and support as straight couples. 

Gay people are not asking to marry in a church. They want a legal marriage from the government. The government should not mix with religion. The government should not stop people from getting married just because a church says no.

Some people worry about gay couples having children. They worry about how children will be treated. This is a problem, but it is not a reason to ban gay marriage.  Children need love and support. Gay parents can give this to their children. 

The government should help all people.  The government should make gay marriage legal in every state.

I work in a hospital. I work in the pharmacy. Some drugs are bad. They are illegal. Some drugs are good. They help people.

Marijuana is illegal. But it can help people. The people in the hospital use pills that are also illegal. These pills are good. They help people.

We should use marijuana to help people. We should not be afraid of it. It is not like alcohol. Alcohol can be bad. But marijuana is not as bad.

Marijuana should be legal. But we should be careful. It should not be easy to get. People should learn to use it well.

People think marijuana is bad. It is not as bad as other drugs. We should not think of it as bad. We should think of it as a way to help people.

The church has changed in the twenty-first century. It is not as strict. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school. I saw my friends there on the weekends. Now, there is a mass for teenagers. It is thirty minutes. People dress more casually. In the summer, people come in beach clothes. Families come late. I think the church is more casual now. People wear jeans and khakis to morning mass.

I do not know about the church's politics. I do not know if these things could have been avoided. Men who are married can also become pedophiles. I think a person's choice is their own. There are other religions where priests can be married. If they want to be married, they should try a different religion.

I think pedophilia is a genetic thing. People are born that way. It is not about how they are raised. You cannot hide it with marriage. I think the church could not have stopped this. If they knew and covered it up, that is bad. I do not think they always knew.

I did not like the war in Iraq. Many people were sad after the attacks on September 11. The Bush group said the war was because of Osama Bin Laden. They said Iraq had bad weapons. This was not true. The Bush group lied to the people. Even Colin Powell said he was not sure of the proof. This is very bad.

The Bush group did not like the rules of the country. They wanted to go to war. The Bush group wanted to hurt Saddam Hussein. His father was in charge before. They also wanted more oil. 

The war has gone on too long. It is hard to leave now. Iraq might fight itself. The United Nations wants other countries to help. This might cause new problems.

Iraq is not strong. Its leaders fight each other. The group that fights with us is now in charge. Iraq is very hard to fix.

I talk about the war in Iraq. I do not like the war. It is not a real war.  We did not tell Congress we would go to war.  We went to war because Iraq did bad things. They hurt us on nine eleven. I do not like the war. I do not know much about it. 

We are in Iraq to make a democracy. We want to get oil from Iraq. But the war makes people sad. We should not stay in Iraq. The people there want to make their own country.  

It is hard to say what to do. We must help the people in Iraq. But we waste money on the war.  The President is sad because the war is bad for him. The war is like the Vietnam War. It is a bad war. 

Some people in Iraq are sad. Their sons and daughters are in the war. 

It is hard to say if we should leave. We must help the people in Iraq. But we must not change their way of life. If we stay, they will hate us more. 

I think the war will go on for a long time.

I think it is not right for the state to make this legal. The Constitution says that there is a separation of church and state. This means the people and the government should be separate.  

Many churches are against this.  The government should not tell churches what is legal or not legal. 

The Constitution protects religious freedom. It is wrong to change the Constitution to say that this is illegal. This would be the first time an amendment is used to stop people from doing something. 

The government should not be involved in this issue. The president wants to stop this because it goes against his beliefs. He wants to pick one religion over others.

Churches should decide what is right for them.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the truth about why we went to war. They said the war was about the attacks on September 11th. But the war was not about September 11th. The government made people scared and angry. They used this to start the war.

I do not like war. I think it is wrong to start a war before being attacked. This war is like the Vietnam War. The government made the same mistakes. Many American soldiers died. 

The government did not know what would happen after the war. They did not know that there would be so much chaos.

The government removed the Iraqi government. They wanted to make Iraq a democracy. This is like what they tried to do in Vietnam. They wanted to stop communism. But it is hard to make a new government work.

The war will be long and hard. There are many people who do not want us there. It is hard to fight against people who are not in a real army. It is hard to fight against your own people.

The government should have been more ready for this war. They should have thought about all the problems. The war is still going on. Many American soldiers are still dying. We are still trying to teach Iraqis to run their own country.

The government did not tell the people the truth about the war. They made it seem easy.

We should not have gone to war. But now we are there. It is hard to leave. We cannot abandon the Iraqi people.

We need to think about how many soldiers have died. How many more will die? Is it worth it to fight for a free Iraq?

If we want to make Iraq a democracy, why not try to do this in other countries too? I think the war is about oil. This is why we are in Iraq. 

We said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. But we never found them. We know North Korea has weapons of mass destruction, but we are not fighting them. I do not think the government is telling the truth.

I hope the war ends soon. I hope there will be peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a choice people make. It seems to be more about how a person is made, not how they grow up. To take away rights from people for something they cannot control is not fair. It is unkind. 

I am for gay marriage. I think the government should not tell people who they can marry. It is a private matter. It is about two people. 

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like other families. They walk their dogs, raise children. They should be able to marry. 

Some people think the government should decide what marriage is. They try to say it is against God. I think this is wrong.

Some people say that being gay is a choice. But I think it is how a person is born. It is not a choice.

Marriage is a private matter. People should be able to marry who they love without government rules.

When you put things on the web, it is for every body to see. You can not take it back. 

I am a resident assistant. I see this all the time. If you put bad things on the web, people will think you are bad. If you talk about hurting people, someone will tell the school. The school must act. They can not let bad things happen.

Some people joke on the web. But the school must be sure. They do not know if a joke is real or not. 

The school got a message about a student. They found the message on the web. The student's friend saw bad things on the web. The friend told the school. The school had to help.

When you put things on the web, people can see them. If you do not want people to see, do not put it on the web.

The school must keep students safe. They must look at the web if they hear about danger.

School officials should not look at students' web pages without their permission. But if someone tells the school about danger, they must look.

Teachers should not pretend to be students on the web. This is wrong.

The war has gone on for much time. At first, the war had a good reason. It was to help people have fair government.

But now, it seems like we fight just to show we are strong.  

I think the reasons for the war may have been bad. President Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein. This may have made the reason for the war bad.

If the reason was to help people have fair government, that is good. But if it was for other reasons, that is not fair.

The war started fast. It seemed like we showed our power. But it has gone on too long.

We should help people have fair government. This is a good reason for war. But now the reason is not clear. We fight just to fight.

We need to stop the war. The people in that country must take care of themselves. We spend too much money on the war. We need money for our own problems like poverty. We need money for schools and roads.

We need to help people in our own country. We should not spend money on war.

I have a question.

Someone saw some bad things on Myspace.

It stopped a bad thing from happening.

This is good.

But is it right to look at people’s pages?

A person can not look at all the pages all day.

It is bad to look at pages just to find bad things.

What if a person is looking for bad things?

I do not have Myspace.

I have Facebook.

It is scary that people can see things about me.

I saw on TV that a man got a girl’s name.

He talked to her on the computer.

He met her in a few minutes.

I would not meet someone like that.

People talk to me on Facebook that I do not know.

They know things about me.

They know my class times.

They know my friends.

They know lots of things.

I try not to put too many things on Facebook.

But I like to talk to my friends.

It is hard to know who to trust.

My roommate said her school stopped students from having Myspace.

I do not know if this is right.

I do not like the Iraq War. Many people think it was a bad idea. This is true in the United States, Iraq, and the world. Most people think we should go home.

The war was bad from the start. Going home will be bad too. The Middle East is hard. The United States and the Middle East are very different. Some people in the United States think we can bring democracy to the Middle East. This is not true.

Saddam Hussein was bad. But we should think about the bad things before we go to war. The war in Iraq is a big problem.

We should go home. The Iraqi people want us to go. We should listen to them. If we go home, maybe things will be better.

Yes, I see gender issues in the United States. It is not just a woman's problem. It is a problem in many jobs. Women face a glass roof. This means even though there should be equal chance, men have a hard time taking orders from a woman. This is because of how society has been for a long time. Women may have the skills for a job, but they may not get it. This is because people think women are not good leaders. Men also face issues. For example, in some jobs, men who stay home with children are looked down on. Society thinks men should work and be the money maker. It is hard for men who want to stay home. In the fashion industry, straight men may not be taken seriously. This is because people think fashion is for women. They may not think men know much about fashion.

I think there is gender discrimination in many jobs. It is hard to change because society has a way of thinking. We have come a long way, but change is slow. More women are becoming leaders. More men are staying home. People are starting to accept these things. We need to show the good qualities of people who are often judged. We cannot be too pushy. If we push too hard, people will resist. We are making progress. Change takes time.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it less serious. It was not a crime. It was like a traffic ticket. People get a notice, not arrested. 

Some people worry about jobs. They worry about what people think about having a marijuana charge. This is true even if the charge is not a crime.

It cost much money to arrest, jail, and put people in court. This cost money for the city. 

Some cities do not have much money. They do not want to spend money on marijuana. Even if it would save money. 

Denver is a city that is open to change. They have more money now. They can use it for schools, old people, and homeless people.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It can be bad. But there are money reasons to make it less serious.

If marijuana is legal, it could be sold like cigarettes. People could smoke it everywhere. This could be bad. 

Many people think smoking marijuana is wrong. 

Alcohol is bad for driving. Marijuana can be bad for how people live their lives.

Everyone reacts to things differently. Some people use things in a bad way.

I think yes. Many things the Church does are old. They have done them for a long time. It is good to have strong beliefs. But it is also good to change when things need to change. 

Many Catholics go to Church every week. They have rules about how things should be done. Sometimes, I feel the Church looks down on people who do not follow the rules exactly. The Church does not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They do not accept people of other religions.

My dad was not Catholic. My mom was Catholic. The Church would not let them marry. This is not being kind to other religions. We learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching. But it is wrong to say you love others and then not accept them.

The Church tells people to do good things. But the way the Church acts is not always good. It is old and should change.

I think it would be good if priests could marry. This would not stop bad things from happening. Bad people might do bad things even if they are married.

I am not sure what I think about this problem. I can not say if one side is right or wrong.

This is a hard problem. It is hard to talk about church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is.

I think all people should have the right to join in a civil union. I do not know if marriage should be the same as a civil union.

The government should not say what kind of marriage people have. The government does not say what kind of religion people have.

If two people join in a civil union, the government should treat them the same. They should not look at what kind of marriage it was.

I think all states should agree on the same rules. Then they can make a law for all of the United States.

I think it is wrong to change the Constitution to ban gay marriage. This is a big problem for some people. But it is not a big enough problem to change the Constitution.

I grew up in a home with Christian beliefs.  Homosexuality is hard for me to think about. I have many gay friends. I do not like the way they live. But I think they should be able to marry.

I think each state should make its own rules about gay marriage. Not the president. Many states are run by Democrats. Many states are run by Republicans. Democrats like gay marriage. Republicans do not. If you live in a state that wants gay marriage, you should accept it. You chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. This is why I think states should decide about gay marriage.

I do not agree with President Bush. He says all states must be against gay marriage. He does not live in every state. He should not tell states what to do.

A new president may come soon. A Democrat may want to allow gay marriage. This will cause problems. It is better if states make their own rules.

Myspace is for the public. It is like a bulletin board. You post things for all to see.

If you post on the internet, people will see it. This includes school people.

The school has a job to keep students safe. They can see Myspace posts. They can see this even at home.

If the school sees something bad on Myspace, they have the right to see it. They want to stop bad things from happening.

Like when schools practice drills for safety, the school looks out for the students. They do this to stop bad things like school shootings.

It is not wrong if school people look at Myspace to keep the school safe.

The big war, it was after nine eleven. I was sad. I want to fight back. I want to hurt them like they hurt us.

But now I think we made a mistake. We were angry. We did not think. We went to war without a plan.

The war was bad for us. The people there fight with each other. They do not fight with us. We can not make them better.

We should leave. The people there need to fix their own problems.

We went to war without knowing what to do. War is different there. They fight in a bad way. They do not want to make their country better. They want us to leave.

We should leave. We were angry. We want revenge. The president said we had to fight. He did this because the people wanted it.

We should have thought more. We should have had a plan. We did not know what to do. We did not work together.

We went to war because we were angry. We made them angry. They will always be the same.

We should leave. We are not helping. We are hurting ourselves.

The Catholic Church needs some changes.  Many people are leaving the Church.  Some people do not like the Church's views.  The Church has strong views on marriage, birth control, and abortion.  These views are old.

People feel the Church is wrong. The Church is against abortion.  People who want abortion may not want to be in the Church.  The Church is also against gay marriage.  People who want gay marriage may not want to be in the Church.

Some people think priests should be married.  They think women can be priests too.  Maybe this would help the Church.  But it is hard to know.

I am not against gay marriage. People are born gay. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be sad about their love. It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can marry but two people of the same sex can not.

I do not think the government should be involved. It is not a bad thing. It is not a bad choice. Gay people should not be punished for who they are.

Gay marriage is good. There is no good reason to say no. Some people say gay couples are bad for families. This is not true. Gay couples are different, but this does not mean they are bad. Gay marriage is like two sides of a coin.

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. For example, they have to pay taxes. If a gay partner is sick, they should be able to visit in the hospital. Now, they can not. This is unfair.

Many studies show that gay couples are happy. They have the same things that make straight couples happy. Gay couples want to be married. They want a legal paper from the government. They are not asking for a church wedding.

The government should not mix with religion. The government should allow gay marriage. It is like segregation. Gay couples are the same as straight couples.

Some people worry about children of gay couples. They worry that children will be treated badly. This is not always true.

The government should help gay people. Gay marriage should be legal in every state. The government should change the law.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see many drugs. Some drugs are bad. Some are good. 

A drug is bad if it is illegal. A drug is good if it helps people. 

Some drugs are bad for you. They can make you sick. 

Some drugs are good for you. They can help you feel better.

Marijuana is illegal. But it can help some people.

Doctors use some drugs that are illegal. They use them to help people.

We should help people.

Alcohol is bad if you use too much. Marijuana is bad if you use too much.

We should be smart about drugs. We should use them when they help us. 

People think marijuana is bad. This is not true.

Marijuana is not as bad as some drugs. It can help people.

The church is not the same now. It is not as strict. When I was younger, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school. I saw my friends at church on the weekends.  Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People wear casual clothes. Some wear beach clothes. Families are late. I think the church is more casual now.  People wear jeans and khakis to morning mass.  

I think the church is the same on the inside. There are problems in the church, but I do not know much about them.

The church has had problems with priests. Some priests hurt children. I do not think marriage would have stopped this. Married men can hurt children, too. People are born that way. It is not the church's fault.

I did not like the war in Iraq. Many people were sad after the attacks on September 11th. Some people think the war in Iraq was a bad idea. The Bush group said Iraq was bad. They said Iraq had big bombs. This is not true. This makes me angry.

The Bush group lied to the people. Colin Powell said he did not think the proof was good. He spoke at the United Nations. This is wrong. It is bad for a leader to lie to the people.

I think the Bush group does not like the rules of the country. They want to make big changes.

I think the Bush group wanted to go to war. They wanted to fight Saddam Hussein. 

I think the Bush group also wanted more oil. This is not fair. 


The war has gone on too long. It is bad if we leave now.  Many people may fight each other.  The United Nations wants other countries to help.

This is also a bad idea. Other countries may take control of Iraq. This is not good for Iraq. The leaders in Iraq are not strong.

The Parliament is not working well. The leader of Iraq does not have much power. Many groups want to be in charge. They fight each other. This is a problem.

The Iraq War is hard to talk about. I do not know all the details.

It feels like a big fight with no good end. We went to Iraq after the big attacks on nine eleven. We think Iraq did the attacks.  

We want to make Iraq like the United States. We also want their oil. But it is making many people sad.

We stay in Iraq to help. But it takes a long time to build a good country. If we leave, people will be mad. They will have to start over.

I feel bad for the President. The war is making him look bad. It is like the Vietnam War. People say it was a bad war.

Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. They want the war to end. But it is hard to say we should end it. Many people are hurting. 

Iraq is very different from the United States. We should not try to make it like us. It will only make things worse.

The war will go on for a long time.

I think it is wrong to make this legal. States should not say it is legal. Churches should make this choice. The Constitution says that church and state are separate. This is clear.

Trying to make laws about this is wrong. It goes against the Constitution. People who want to make this illegal are picking one church over others. Many Catholics and Christians do not support this.

The government should not say what churches can and cannot do. The separation of church and state is important. It lets people have different beliefs.

Making a new law about this would be wrong. It would go against the Constitution. It would be one of the few laws that stops people, not the government.

The government should not be involved in this. I do not know why someone wants to make a new law. This person is Catholic. He wants to follow his own beliefs.

Churches should decide this, not the president or the government. There is no good reason to make a new law. I do not see how it will hurt the country. It may even help.

The war in Iraq is a big problem. The government did not tell the people the truth about why they went to war. They said the war was about the bad things that happened on September 11th. But the war and the attacks were not really connected. The government made people angry and scared. They used this to start the war in 2003.

I do not like war. I do not like fighting first. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government made the same mistakes. Many American soldiers died.

The government took over the Iraqi government. They did not think about what would happen next. There was a lot of fighting and no one was in charge.

The United States tried to make Iraq a democracy. They did this in Vietnam too. They wanted to remove the Communists. But it did not work.

It is hard to win a war when you are fighting people who live in the country. It is not like fighting an army.

The government should have been ready for this war. They should have thought about all the problems. The war is still going on. Many American soldiers are still dying.

The government made people think the war would be quick and easy. It is not. It takes a long time to make a new government.

I am for gay marriage.  I always have been. 

I think it is a personal choice. It is good for people. Now we know it can be part of how a person is born. 

It is not fair to take away rights from people because of this. It is not their fault. I think it is wrong. I have always supported gay marriage.

I do not think the government should have a say in this. It is a private matter. It is for families, not the government.

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like other families. They walk their dogs and do normal things. 

Some people want to control who can marry. I think this is wrong.

I have read that being gay can be part of a person's brain. It may be how a person is born. It is not a choice.

Marriage is a private thing. People should be able to marry if they want.

When you put things on the computer, it is for the world to see. People can see it. You can not put bad things on the computer. If you say bad things, people will think bad things about you. The computer is for everyone. If you say you want to hurt someone, people will tell the school. The school must act.

Sometimes people say things as a joke. But it can be hard to know if someone is joking. If the school hears about a bad thing, they must look into it. 

You must be careful what you put on the computer. If you do not want people to see it, do not put it on the computer. People will see what you put on the computer. You can not tell people what to think.

The war is long. It start good. We want to help people have good government. But now, we fight for a long time. We fight to show we are strong. 

Some people say the war start because of old problem between George Bush’s father and Saddam Hussein.  

If we want to help people have fair government, that is good. But if we fight for other reason, it is not fair.

We win fast at the start. But the war last too long. It is time to stop.

We help people have good government. That is a good reason to fight. But now, we fight for the wrong reason. We fight to win. 

We waste money on war. We need money for our own people. We need money for schools, roads, and health.

We need to stop the war.

Can I ask a question? I want to know why it was bad.

I think it good that someone saw the bad thing.

It is good that someone saw the bad thing and could help.

It is hard to look at all the profiles. It is not fair to pick on some students. 

It is bad to look at profiles just to find bad things. 

I do not have Myspace. But I have Facebook.

I am worried about bad people. They can see things about me.

I saw a news story. A man could get a girl's name. He talked to her on the computer. 

He met her soon.

I would not meet a stranger. Some people in my class send me messages.

They know my name. They know things about me.

I try not to put too much on Facebook.

I want to talk to my friends.

It is hard to know who to trust.

My roommate said her school did not allow Myspace.

I do not know why the school could do that.

We talk about war.  I feel bad to talk about it. Many people say they were against the war. I was too. But it is not important now.  Most people think the war was bad. This is true in the United States, Iraq, and the world.  Eighty percent of Iraqis think the war was bad. Seventy percent of U.S. troops think it was a bad idea. We should leave.

The war is a disaster. It was a disaster before we went there.  It will be a disaster when we leave. The Middle East is hard.  The United States and the Middle East are different. The government thinks it can bring democracy to the Middle East. This is not true.  The Iraqi people do not want this.

Saddam was bad. But we should think about the good and bad before we go to war. The war is like quicksand.

I do not see why we should stay.

The government has ideas about staying. But I do not agree. I do not see a good reason to stay. If we leave slowly, I will not be upset. But I think we should leave now.

Many Iraqis want us to leave. They want us to leave now. They know best. If we ask them, and they say leave, then it is not our fault if things go wrong.  We will be the good guys. 

We will never be good guys in the Middle East. But it will be better than now.

Yes, I think gender is still a problem in the United States. It is not just women. 

Some jobs have more problems. Women have a hard time. There is a "glass roof". People think women should be equal, but men may not want a woman as their boss. This is how society has always been. 

Women may have the skills for a job, but they may not get it. People think women do not work well in big business. 

Men have problems too. For example, it is not common for men to stay home with children. People think men should work and make money. 

In the fashion world, men may not be taken seriously if they are straight. People think fashion is for women.

I think there is gender discrimination in many jobs. Change is slow. Women are getting more jobs, but it takes time. More men are staying home with children. People are starting to understand.

We need to show people the good things about those who are different. We should not be too pushy. Change takes time.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it not a crime. This is like a traffic ticket. You get a warning. You do not go to jail.

Some people worry about this. They worry about jobs. They worry about the future.

It is very cost to put people in jail. It is cost to have a trial.

Some towns do not have much money. They want to save money. They do not like marijuana.

Denver is different. Denver is open to new ideas. Denver has more money now. They can spend it on schools and help for old people.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not good to smoke in public.

Alcohol is bad for driving. Marijuana is bad for some people's lives.

Marijuana is different for every person. Some people use too much. Some people use just enough. It is hard to know. Both marijuana and alcohol are bad.

I say yes to this. Some things they do are old. They do them for a long time. It is good to have old ideas. But it is also good to change. Some Catholics go to church every week. They have rules for how to do things. Sometimes, I feel the church looks down on people who do not follow the rules. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They do not accept other religions. My father was not Catholic. My mother was Catholic. They would not marry them. This is not being kind to other religions. We learn to love others. This is a Catholic idea. But it is not kind to say love others and not accept them. Some Catholic ideas tell you to do things. But the church does not follow these ideas. The ideas are old. They still use them.

I think it would be good if priests could marry. But this would not stop bad people from doing bad things. Some people hurt children. They would do this even if they were married. It is not the same as a spouse.

I am not sure about this topic. It is hard to say if one side is right or wrong.

This is a hard topic. It is about church and state. It is also about how to say what marriage is. This is hard to do without hurting people.

I think all unions should be equal. I do not know if marriage should be from the government. Marriage is a special time. But people do not get tax help from the government if they are baptized.

If you are married, the government should see it as a union. It is two people. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

If all states agree, they should make it a law for all. It is not good to change the constitution to say no to gay marriage.

The constitution should not be changed for this. Some people care about this, but it is not big enough to change the constitution.

I was raised in a Christian family.  Homosexuality is hard for me to think about. I have gay friends. I do not agree with this way of life. But I think it should be legal. I do not think it is a big problem for the whole country. I think each state should decide. 

Some states are democratic. Some are republican. Democratic states want gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you know how they feel. You made a choice to live there. You should respect their decision if they choose to make gay marriage legal. 

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. I think each state should decide about gay marriage.

I do not think the president should say no to gay marriage for all the country. I think each state should decide for itself. I do not agree with the president's ban. 

The president does not live in every state. He should not tell each state what to do.  I think some things should be up to each state. The president will leave soon. A new president might change the law. It is better to let each state decide. They have to live with the decision.

Myspace is for the public. People can see what you write. If you post on the internet, people will see it. This includes school staff.

School staff may see things on Myspace even if they are not at school. They can see things from home.

If the school sees something bad on Myspace, they have a right to see it. This is because the school wants to keep students safe.

It is good if the school can stop bad things from happening.

Some people say it is wrong for school staff to look at Myspace. They say it is a privacy problem.

But, if the school sees something bad that may hurt students, it is not wrong.

The school wants to keep students safe.

People should think before they post on Myspace.

The war. I think I was for it at first. Nine Eleven hurt me. I want to hurt them. 

But now I see things different. We went in fast. We were not ready. I think we made a big mistake. 

The people fight with each other. If they fight, they can not fight us. I do not think we can help them. They must help themselves.

I do not care much about them. They fight. They can not work together. 

We did not know what to do when we got there. Their war is different. They are wild. They want us to leave. I think we should leave.

We were angry after Nine Eleven. We wanted revenge. The President said we must fight. But I think we should have thought more. 

We did not have a good plan. No one knew what to do. There was no good plan. We went in with anger. We made more anger.

We can not change them. They will always be this way.

I think we stay too long. We do not make enough progress.

When we leave, it will be bad. We can not stay there forever.

We hurt ourselves by staying.
