The Catholic Church needs some changes.  Many people are leaving the Church.  Some people do not like the Church's views.  The Church has strong views on marriage, birth control, and abortion.  These views are old.

People feel the Church is wrong. The Church is against abortion.  People who want abortion may not want to be in the Church.  The Church is also against gay marriage.  People who want gay marriage may not want to be in the Church.

Some people think priests should be married.  They think women can be priests too.  Maybe this would help the Church.  But it is hard to know.

I am not against gay marriage. People are born gay. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be sad about their love. It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can marry but two people of the same sex can not.

I do not think the government should be involved. It is not a bad thing. It is not a bad choice. Gay people should not be punished for who they are.

Gay marriage is good. There is no good reason to say no. Some people say gay couples are bad for families. This is not true. Gay couples are different, but this does not mean they are bad. Gay marriage is like two sides of a coin.

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. For example, they have to pay taxes. If a gay partner is sick, they should be able to visit in the hospital. Now, they can not. This is unfair.

Many studies show that gay couples are happy. They have the same things that make straight couples happy. Gay couples want to be married. They want a legal paper from the government. They are not asking for a church wedding.

The government should not mix with religion. The government should allow gay marriage. It is like segregation. Gay couples are the same as straight couples.

Some people worry about children of gay couples. They worry that children will be treated badly. This is not always true.

The government should help gay people. Gay marriage should be legal in every state. The government should change the law.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see many drugs. Some drugs are bad. Some are good. 

A drug is bad if it is illegal. A drug is good if it helps people. 

Some drugs are bad for you. They can make you sick. 

Some drugs are good for you. They can help you feel better.

Marijuana is illegal. But it can help some people.

Doctors use some drugs that are illegal. They use them to help people.

We should help people.

Alcohol is bad if you use too much. Marijuana is bad if you use too much.

We should be smart about drugs. We should use them when they help us. 

People think marijuana is bad. This is not true.

Marijuana is not as bad as some drugs. It can help people.

The church is not the same now. It is not as strict. When I was younger, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school. I saw my friends at church on the weekends.  Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People wear casual clothes. Some wear beach clothes. Families are late. I think the church is more casual now.  People wear jeans and khakis to morning mass.  

I think the church is the same on the inside. There are problems in the church, but I do not know much about them.

The church has had problems with priests. Some priests hurt children. I do not think marriage would have stopped this. Married men can hurt children, too. People are born that way. It is not the church's fault.

I did not like the war in Iraq. Many people were sad after the attacks on September 11th. Some people think the war in Iraq was a bad idea. The Bush group said Iraq was bad. They said Iraq had big bombs. This is not true. This makes me angry.

The Bush group lied to the people. Colin Powell said he did not think the proof was good. He spoke at the United Nations. This is wrong. It is bad for a leader to lie to the people.

I think the Bush group does not like the rules of the country. They want to make big changes.

I think the Bush group wanted to go to war. They wanted to fight Saddam Hussein. 

I think the Bush group also wanted more oil. This is not fair. 


The war has gone on too long. It is bad if we leave now.  Many people may fight each other.  The United Nations wants other countries to help.

This is also a bad idea. Other countries may take control of Iraq. This is not good for Iraq. The leaders in Iraq are not strong.

The Parliament is not working well. The leader of Iraq does not have much power. Many groups want to be in charge. They fight each other. This is a problem.

The Iraq War is hard to talk about. I do not know all the details.

It feels like a big fight with no good end. We went to Iraq after the big attacks on nine eleven. We think Iraq did the attacks.  

We want to make Iraq like the United States. We also want their oil. But it is making many people sad.

We stay in Iraq to help. But it takes a long time to build a good country. If we leave, people will be mad. They will have to start over.

I feel bad for the President. The war is making him look bad. It is like the Vietnam War. People say it was a bad war.

Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. They want the war to end. But it is hard to say we should end it. Many people are hurting. 

Iraq is very different from the United States. We should not try to make it like us. It will only make things worse.

The war will go on for a long time.

I think it is wrong to make this legal. States should not say it is legal. Churches should make this choice. The Constitution says that church and state are separate. This is clear.

Trying to make laws about this is wrong. It goes against the Constitution. People who want to make this illegal are picking one church over others. Many Catholics and Christians do not support this.

The government should not say what churches can and cannot do. The separation of church and state is important. It lets people have different beliefs.

Making a new law about this would be wrong. It would go against the Constitution. It would be one of the few laws that stops people, not the government.

The government should not be involved in this. I do not know why someone wants to make a new law. This person is Catholic. He wants to follow his own beliefs.

Churches should decide this, not the president or the government. There is no good reason to make a new law. I do not see how it will hurt the country. It may even help.

The war in Iraq is a big problem. The government did not tell the people the truth about why they went to war. They said the war was about the bad things that happened on September 11th. But the war and the attacks were not really connected. The government made people angry and scared. They used this to start the war in 2003.

I do not like war. I do not like fighting first. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government made the same mistakes. Many American soldiers died.

The government took over the Iraqi government. They did not think about what would happen next. There was a lot of fighting and no one was in charge.

The United States tried to make Iraq a democracy. They did this in Vietnam too. They wanted to remove the Communists. But it did not work.

It is hard to win a war when you are fighting people who live in the country. It is not like fighting an army.

The government should have been ready for this war. They should have thought about all the problems. The war is still going on. Many American soldiers are still dying.

The government made people think the war would be quick and easy. It is not. It takes a long time to make a new government.

Marriage is a private thing. People should be able to marry if they want.

Yes, I think gender is still a problem in the United States. It is not just women.

We were angry after Nine Eleven. We wanted revenge. The President said we must fight. But I think we should have thought more. 

We did not have a good plan. No one knew what to do. There was no good plan. We went in with anger. We made more anger.

We can not change them. They will always be this way.

I think we stay too long. We do not make enough progress.

When we leave, it will be bad. We can not stay there forever.

We hurt ourselves by staying.

transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs some changes.  Many people are leaving the Church.  Some people do not like the Church's views.  The Church has strong views on marriage, birth control, and abortion.  These views are old.

People feel the Church is wrong. The Church is against abortion.  People who want abortion may not want to be in the Church.  The Church is also against gay marriage.  People who want gay marriage may not want to be in the Church.

Some people think priests should be married.  They think women can be priests too.  Maybe this would help the Church.  But it is hard to know.

I am not against gay marriage. People are born gay. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be sad about their love. It is wrong to say that a man and a woman can marry but two people of the same sex can not.

I do not think the government should be involved. It is not a bad thing. It is not a bad choice. Gay people should not be punished for who they are.

Gay marriage is good. There is no good reason to say no. Some people say gay couples are bad for families. This is not true. Gay couples are different, but this does not mean they are bad. Gay marriage is like two sides of a coin.

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. For example, they have to pay taxes. If a gay partner is sick, they should be able to visit in the hospital. Now, they can not. This is unfair.

Many studies show that gay couples are happy. They have the same things that make straight couples happy. Gay couples want to be married. They want a legal paper from the government. They are not asking for a church wedding.

The government should not mix with religion. The government should allow gay marriage. It is like segregation. Gay couples are the same as straight couples.

Some people worry about children of gay couples. They worry that children will be treated badly. This is not always true.

The government should help gay people. Gay marriage should be legal in every state. The government should change the law.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see many drugs. Some drugs are bad. Some are good. 

A drug is bad if it is illegal. A drug is good if it helps people. 

Some drugs are bad for you. They can make you sick. 

Some drugs are good for you. They can help you feel better.

Marijuana is illegal. But it can help some people.

Doctors use some drugs that are illegal. They use them to help people.

We should help people.

Alcohol is bad if you use too much. Marijuana is bad if you use too much.

We should be smart about drugs. We should use them when they help us. 

People think marijuana is bad. This is not true.

Marijuana is not as bad as some drugs. It can help people.

The church is not the same now. It is not as strict. When I was younger, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school. I saw my friends at church on the weekends.  Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People wear casual clothes. Some wear beach clothes. Families are late. I think the church is more casual now.  People wear jeans and khakis to morning mass.  

I think the church is the same on the inside. There are problems in the church, but I do not know much about them.

The church has had problems with priests. Some priests hurt children. I do not think marriage would have stopped this. Married men can hurt children, too. People are born that way. It is not the church's fault.

I did not like the war in Iraq. Many people were sad after the attacks on September 11th. Some people think the war in Iraq was a bad idea. The Bush group said Iraq was bad. They said Iraq had big bombs. This is not true. This makes me angry.

The Bush group lied to the people. Colin Powell said he did not think the proof was good. He spoke at the United Nations. This is wrong. It is bad for a leader to lie to the people.

I think the Bush group does not like the rules of the country. They want to make big changes.

I think the Bush group wanted to go to war. They wanted to fight Saddam Hussein. 

I think the Bush group also wanted more oil. This is not fair. 


The war has gone on too long. It is bad if we leave now.  Many people may fight each other.  The United Nations wants other countries to help.

This is also a bad idea. Other countries may take control of Iraq. This is not good for Iraq. The leaders in Iraq are not strong.

The Parliament is not working well. The leader of Iraq does not have much power. Many groups want to be in charge. They fight each other. This is a problem.

The Iraq War is hard to talk about. I do not know all the details.

It feels like a big fight with no good end. We went to Iraq after the big attacks on nine eleven. We think Iraq did the attacks.  

We want to make Iraq like the United States. We also want their oil. But it is making many people sad.

We stay in Iraq to help. But it takes a long time to build a good country. If we leave, people will be mad. They will have to start over.

I feel bad for the President. The war is making him look bad. It is like the Vietnam War. People say it was a bad war.

Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. They want the war to end. But it is hard to say we should end it. Many people are hurting. 

Iraq is very different from the United States. We should not try to make it like us. It will only make things worse.

The war will go on for a long time.

I think it is wrong to make this legal. States should not say it is legal. Churches should make this choice. The Constitution says that church and state are separate. This is clear.

Trying to make laws about this is wrong. It goes against the Constitution. People who want to make this illegal are picking one church over others. Many Catholics and Christians do not support this.

The government should not say what churches can and cannot do. The separation of church and state is important. It lets people have different beliefs.

Making a new law about this would be wrong. It would go against the Constitution. It would be one of the few laws that stops people, not the government.

The government should not be involved in this. I do not know why someone wants to make a new law. This person is Catholic. He wants to follow his own beliefs.

Churches should decide this, not the president or the government. There is no good reason to make a new law. I do not see how it will hurt the country. It may even help.

The war in Iraq is a big problem. The government did not tell the people the truth about why they went to war. They said the war was about the bad things that happened on September 11th. But the war and the attacks were not really connected. The government made people angry and scared. They used this to start the war in 2003.

I do not like war. I do not like fighting first. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government made the same mistakes. Many American soldiers died.

The government took over the Iraqi government. They did not think about what would happen next. There was a lot of fighting and no one was in charge.

The United States tried to make Iraq a democracy. They did this in Vietnam too. They wanted to remove the Communists. But it did not work.

It is hard to win a war when you are fighting people who live in the country. It is not like fighting an army.

The government should have been ready for this war. They should have thought about all the problems. The war is still going on. Many American soldiers are still dying.

The government made people think the war would be quick and easy. It is not. It takes a long time to make a new government.

I am for gay marriage.  I always have been. 

I think it is a personal choice. It is good for people. Now we know it can be part of how a person is born. 

It is not fair to take away rights from people because of this. It is not their fault. I think it is wrong. I have always supported gay marriage.

I do not think the government should have a say in this. It is a private matter. It is for families, not the government.

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who live like other families. They walk their dogs and do normal things. 

Some people want to control who can marry. I think this is wrong.

I have read that being gay can be part of a person's brain. It may be how a person is born. It is not a choice.

Marriage is a private thing. People should be able to marry if they want.

When you put things on the computer, it is for the world to see. People can see it. You can not put bad things on the computer. If you say bad things, people will think bad things about you. The computer is for everyone. If you say you want to hurt someone, people will tell the school. The school must act.

Sometimes people say things as a joke. But it can be hard to know if someone is joking. If the school hears about a bad thing, they must look into it. 

You must be careful what you put on the computer. If you do not want people to see it, do not put it on the computer. People will see what you put on the computer. You can not tell people what to think.

The war is long. It start good. We want to help people have good government. But now, we fight for a long time. We fight to show we are strong. 

Some people say the war start because of old problem between George Bush’s father and Saddam Hussein.  

If we want to help people have fair government, that is good. But if we fight for other reason, it is not fair.

We win fast at the start. But the war last too long. It is time to stop.

We help people have good government. That is a good reason to fight. But now, we fight for the wrong reason. We fight to win. 

We waste money on war. We need money for our own people. We need money for schools, roads, and health.

We need to stop the war.

Can I ask a question? I want to know why it was bad.

I think it good that someone saw the bad thing.

It is good that someone saw the bad thing and could help.

It is hard to look at all the profiles. It is not fair to pick on some students. 

It is bad to look at profiles just to find bad things. 

I do not have Myspace. But I have Facebook.

I am worried about bad people. They can see things about me.

I saw a news story. A man could get a girl's name. He talked to her on the computer. 

He met her soon.

I would not meet a stranger. Some people in my class send me messages.

They know my name. They know things about me.

I try not to put too much on Facebook.

I want to talk to my friends.

It is hard to know who to trust.

My roommate said her school did not allow Myspace.

I do not know why the school could do that.

We talk about war.  I feel bad to talk about it. Many people say they were against the war. I was too. But it is not important now.  Most people think the war was bad. This is true in the United States, Iraq, and the world.  Eighty percent of Iraqis think the war was bad. Seventy percent of U.S. troops think it was a bad idea. We should leave.

The war is a disaster. It was a disaster before we went there.  It will be a disaster when we leave. The Middle East is hard.  The United States and the Middle East are different. The government thinks it can bring democracy to the Middle East. This is not true.  The Iraqi people do not want this.

Saddam was bad. But we should think about the good and bad before we go to war. The war is like quicksand.

I do not see why we should stay.

The government has ideas about staying. But I do not agree. I do not see a good reason to stay. If we leave slowly, I will not be upset. But I think we should leave now.

Many Iraqis want us to leave. They want us to leave now. They know best. If we ask them, and they say leave, then it is not our fault if things go wrong.  We will be the good guys. 

We will never be good guys in the Middle East. But it will be better than now.

Yes, I think gender is still a problem in the United States. It is not just women. 

Some jobs have more problems. Women have a hard time. There is a "glass roof". People think women should be equal, but men may not want a woman as their boss. This is how society has always been. 

Women may have the skills for a job, but they may not get it. People think women do not work well in big business. 

Men have problems too. For example, it is not common for men to stay home with children. People think men should work and make money. 

In the fashion world, men may not be taken seriously if they are straight. People think fashion is for women.

I think there is gender discrimination in many jobs. Change is slow. Women are getting more jobs, but it takes time. More men are staying home with children. People are starting to understand.

We need to show people the good things about those who are different. We should not be too pushy. Change takes time.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it not a crime. This is like a traffic ticket. You get a warning. You do not go to jail.

Some people worry about this. They worry about jobs. They worry about the future.

It is very cost to put people in jail. It is cost to have a trial.

Some towns do not have much money. They want to save money. They do not like marijuana.

Denver is different. Denver is open to new ideas. Denver has more money now. They can spend it on schools and help for old people.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is not good to smoke in public.

Alcohol is bad for driving. Marijuana is bad for some people's lives.

Marijuana is different for every person. Some people use too much. Some people use just enough. It is hard to know. Both marijuana and alcohol are bad.

I say yes to this. Some things they do are old. They do them for a long time. It is good to have old ideas. But it is also good to change. Some Catholics go to church every week. They have rules for how to do things. Sometimes, I feel the church looks down on people who do not follow the rules. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They do not accept other religions. My father was not Catholic. My mother was Catholic. They would not marry them. This is not being kind to other religions. We learn to love others. This is a Catholic idea. But it is not kind to say love others and not accept them. Some Catholic ideas tell you to do things. But the church does not follow these ideas. The ideas are old. They still use them.

I think it would be good if priests could marry. But this would not stop bad people from doing bad things. Some people hurt children. They would do this even if they were married. It is not the same as a spouse.

I am not sure about this topic. It is hard to say if one side is right or wrong.

This is a hard topic. It is about church and state. It is also about how to say what marriage is. This is hard to do without hurting people.

I think all unions should be equal. I do not know if marriage should be from the government. Marriage is a special time. But people do not get tax help from the government if they are baptized.

If you are married, the government should see it as a union. It is two people. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is.

If all states agree, they should make it a law for all. It is not good to change the constitution to say no to gay marriage.

The constitution should not be changed for this. Some people care about this, but it is not big enough to change the constitution.

I was raised in a Christian family.  Homosexuality is hard for me to think about. I have gay friends. I do not agree with this way of life. But I think it should be legal. I do not think it is a big problem for the whole country. I think each state should decide. 

Some states are democratic. Some are republican. Democratic states want gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you know how they feel. You made a choice to live there. You should respect their decision if they choose to make gay marriage legal. 

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. I think each state should decide about gay marriage.

I do not think the president should say no to gay marriage for all the country. I think each state should decide for itself. I do not agree with the president's ban. 

The president does not live in every state. He should not tell each state what to do.  I think some things should be up to each state. The president will leave soon. A new president might change the law. It is better to let each state decide. They have to live with the decision.

Myspace is for the public. People can see what you write. If you post on the internet, people will see it. This includes school staff.

School staff may see things on Myspace even if they are not at school. They can see things from home.

If the school sees something bad on Myspace, they have a right to see it. This is because the school wants to keep students safe.

It is good if the school can stop bad things from happening.

Some people say it is wrong for school staff to look at Myspace. They say it is a privacy problem.

But, if the school sees something bad that may hurt students, it is not wrong.

The school wants to keep students safe.

People should think before they post on Myspace.

The war. I think I was for it at first. Nine Eleven hurt me. I want to hurt them. 

But now I see things different. We went in fast. We were not ready. I think we made a big mistake. 

The people fight with each other. If they fight, they can not fight us. I do not think we can help them. They must help themselves.

I do not care much about them. They fight. They can not work together. 

We did not know what to do when we got there. Their war is different. They are wild. They want us to leave. I think we should leave.

We were angry after Nine Eleven. We wanted revenge. The President said we must fight. But I think we should have thought more. 

We did not have a good plan. No one knew what to do. There was no good plan. We went in with anger. We made more anger.

We can not change them. They will always be this way.

I think we stay too long. We do not make enough progress.

When we leave, it will be bad. We can not stay there forever.

We hurt ourselves by staying.

The Catholic Church needs to change. Many people are leaving the church. This is because the church has strong views on some things. For example, the church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These views are old. The church should think about new ideas. This will help the church keep its members. 

People are not happy with the church's views. Some people do not agree with the church on these subjects. The church is against abortion. If a person wants an abortion, they may not want to be part of the church.

The same is true for gay marriage. If a person supports gay marriage, they may not want to be part of the church. 

I think priests should be able to marry. Priests are very good at their jobs.  But they also need a family. Everyone else has a job and a family. Priests should be able to have both.

Gay marriage is good. I think people should be free to love who they want. People are born this way. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be bad for who they are. It is not fair to say that a man and a woman can get married but two men or two women cannot. It is wrong.

I think the government should not be involved. It is not a legal problem. It is not a moral problem. The government should not tell people who they can love. Gay people should not be punished for this.

Gay marriage is good. There is no good reason to not allow it. Some people think gay couples are bad for families. But gay couples are different. They are not the same as straight couples.

Gay couples want the same rights as straight couples. They want to pay taxes and make health care decisions for each other. If a gay person is sick, their partner can not be in the room. This is not fair.

Many studies show gay couples are the same as straight couples. They are happy. 

Gay people want a marriage paper from the government. This is not about religion. The government should not make laws based on religion.

Some people say gay people are bad for children. But children of gay parents are the same as children of straight parents.

The government should make gay marriage legal in all states. This is fair.

I work at a hospital. I help people get medicine. Some drugs are bad and illegal. But some drugs can help people. Some drugs are both bad and illegal.

Marijuana is illegal. But it can help some people feel better. Some drugs are illegal but help people. Doctors use them. We need to help people who need medicine.

Some people say marijuana is bad. But it is not as bad as some other drugs. If people can use marijuana safely, it can help them.

We should learn more about marijuana. We should not be afraid of it.

The church has changed. It is not as strict now. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school. I saw my friends there. We would go to church.

Now, there is a mass for teens. It is thirty minutes long. People dress more casually. In summer, people come in beach clothes. Families come in late.

Even at the morning mass, people wear jeans and khakis.

The biggest change is the dress code.

I do not know much about church politics.

[About the priest problems, do you think the church should change?]

I do not think these things could have been stopped. Married men can be bad. They can like young children.

I think priests choose to be priests. Some religions let priests marry. If they want to be married, they can join a different religion.

[Can you say more about this?]

I think being bad with children is about genetics. People are born that way. It is not about how they are raised.

Marriage will not help. 

I think the church could not stop this. If they knew and hid it, that is wrong. But I do not think they always knew.

[Do you have other thoughts about the church?]

No.

I was good with the plan at first. But many people were sad about the September 11 attacks. I think we went to Iraq for wrong reasons. The Bush group said Iraq was bad. They said Iraq had bad weapons. They said Iraq was bad for America. This was not true.

I am mad about this. I think the Bush group lied to the people. Even Colin Powell said he did not think Iraq was bad. He gave a speech at the United Nations. Now he says he did not believe the facts. This is wrong. This is bad for the country.

I think the Bush group does not like the rules of our country. They want to change them. Since September 11, things have changed.

I think the Bush group wanted to go to war.

The man who had money for the country said the Bush group wanted war. He wrote about it in a book. He left his job.

I think the young Bush man wanted to fight Iraq. His father had a fight with Iraq before. I think he wanted oil from Iraq.

I think we should leave Iraq. But it will be bad if we leave now. Iraq may fight among itself. More people will die.

The United Nations and the United States want other countries to help Iraq. But I do not like this idea. Other countries will have too much power. Iraq will not be in control of itself.

The leader of Iraq is weak. His group is not working well. The man who was fighting us is now in the government. He has many seats in the government.

Iraq is fighting with itself.

The Iraq War is hard to talk about. I do not know much about it. 

I think the war is not fair. We did not declare war. We use guns to show we are strong. 

I do not think it is good to call it a war. We should help Iraq. But it is hard. We use many resources. The war makes people sad.

The president looks bad.  People say he made a bad war like the Vietnam War.

Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to come home. But the people in Iraq need help too.

Iraq has many problems. They fight with each other. We want to help them. But we are different. We should not change them.

The war will go on for a long time.

I do not think it is right to make this legal. This is a question for the churches. The Constitution says the church and state must be separate. This is clear. It is wrong to try to make rules about this. This goes against what the Constitution says. 

Some people want to make this illegal. This is bad. It is like choosing one church over another. Most Catholics and Christians do not support this.

The government should not say what churches can and cannot do. The separation of church and state is very important. It lets people have different religions.

Changing the Constitution to ban this would be wrong. It would go against what the Constitution already says. It would be one of the few changes that would hurt people, not help the government.

The government should not be involved in this. The person trying to change the law wants to do this because of his own beliefs. He likes one religion more than others.

The churches should decide this, not the president or the government. There is no good reason to ban this. It will not help the economy. It may even help society.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the true reason for the war. They said the war was about the bad things that happened on September 11th. This was not true. The government used people's fear to start the war.

I am against war. It is wrong to attack first. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government made the same mistakes. Many American soldiers died in Iraq. The government was not ready for what would happen after the war.

The government took away the Iraqi government. They tried to give Iraq a new government. This is like what happened in Vietnam. The US tried to stop communism. The US thought it would be easy to win. It was not easy.

The US should not have gone to war in Iraq. They should have planned for all the problems. The war is still going on. Many American soldiers are still dying. It is hard to make Iraq a peaceful country. The US government did not tell the people the truth about the war. 

The US should think about how many soldiers have died. Is it worth it to keep fighting? Why is the US only trying to make Iraq a democracy? Why not help other countries? The US may want to control oil in Iraq.

The US said Iraq had bad weapons. These weapons were not found. The US knows that North Korea has bad weapons, but they are not attacking. The US government is not being honest.

I hope the war ends soon. I hope there is peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a personal choice.  Some studies say it may be in a person's genes. This means people cannot choose to be gay. It is not fair to give people less rights because of this.

I think it is wrong to stop people from getting married because they are gay. Marriage is a personal thing. It is between two people. The government should not have a say in this.

I know some gay couples in my neighborhood. They live like other families. They walk their dogs and do normal things. They want to get married but they cannot.

I think it is wrong for the government to tell people what they can and cannot do with their lives.  Some people say being gay is a chemical thing in the brain.  You are born this way.

Many people think marriage should be a private matter. People should be able to marry who they want without the government getting involved.

When you put things on the net, it is for all to see. You can not take it back.

As a Resident Assistant, I have seen this. You put things on the net. People see them. They think about you.

If you talk about bad things, people will be afraid.

The net is for many people. If you talk about hurting people, the school will know. They must stop it.

You can not be sure if people are joking or serious. Sometimes people say bad things as a joke. But it can be wrong. 

At my school, a friend saw bad things on the net. He told the school. The school looked at the things. They saw words that could be bad. The person may have meant it as a joke. But it was not funny.

You put things on the net. No one has a right to be mad if they see them. 

If you do not want people to see it, do not put it on the net.

The war has been going on too long. At first, the goal was good. The goal was to give democracy to another country. But now, we may be fighting just to show we are strong.

At the start, the reasons for the war may have been bad. President Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein before. If the goal was to give people democracy, that is good. But if there were other reasons, it was not fair.

The war started fast. We showed we were strong. But it has gone on too long.

If we wanted to help people who were ruled by a bad leader, that is a good reason to fight. But our reasons have changed. Now, we may be fighting just to win. We need to end the war.

It is time to stop. The people in that country must fight for themselves. We are spending a lot of money on the war. We need that money for our own problems, like poverty. We have many problems at home.

We need to spend money on schools, roads, and health care. We should not spend money on war. Billions of dollars are being spent. Our citizens are dying in a war we no longer need to fight.

It is hard to know what to do. We want to keep people safe. But we also want people to have privacy.

It is not right to look at all the students' pages. That is not fair.  

But we must be careful. Some bad things can happen on the internet.

I have a Facebook. I know people can see things about me. I am careful about what I put on the web.

Some people can be bad. They use the internet to find people.

It is hard to know who to trust.

My friend told me about her high school. They did not let students use Myspace.

That is strange. How can a school tell students what they can do on the web?

We talk about the war in Iraq. I know it is hard to talk about. Many people say they were against the war. I was also against it. Now, it is not so important what we think.

The war was a bad idea. Most people think so. The polls show this. People in the United States, Iraq, and around the world think the war was wrong. 

The war is a disaster. It was a disaster before we went there. Now it is still a disaster. It is hard to do anything right in the Middle East.

The war is because of different cultures. The United States and the Middle East are very different.

The United States wants to bring democracy to Iraq. But democracy is not for everyone.  

Saddam Hussein was bad. But, we should think about the bad things before we go to war. We should not go to war unless we have a good reason.

We should leave Iraq. Most Iraqis want us to leave. They know what is best for them.

We should ask Iraq if they want us to stay. If they say no, then we should leave.

Yes, I think there is still a problem with men and women not being treated the same in the United States.  It is not just women. It also depends on the type of work. 

I think women still have a hard time. There is a problem called the "glass ceiling." Even though there should be equal chance for all, some men have a hard time working for a woman. This is because of how people have always done things.

A woman may be good for a job. She may have the needed skills. But some people will not give her the job just because women are not often in high places in business. 

This also happens to men. For example, it is not common for a man to stay home to care for children. People may look down on him. They think men should work and be the main money maker. 

In the fashion world, some people do not take men seriously if they like fashion. It is because people think fashion is for women.

I think there is gender discrimination in the United States. It is hard to change because people have strong ideas about how things should be.

But things are slowly getting better. More women are in high jobs. More people accept men who stay home. 

We need to show the good things about people who are often judged. We should not be too forceful. 

Change takes time. We are making progress.

The law did not make marijuana legal. They made it not a crime. This means it is like a traffic ticket. You get a note, not jail.  Some people worry about jobs. A drug charge can hurt your job. even if the law is not very bad.

Some people do not like marijuana. They do not want to make it legal. They think it is bad.  Denver is different. People there like change. I think it is good that they make marijuana not a crime.

I do not want marijuana to be sold everywhere. Some people think it is bad. Some people smoke marijuana and then drive. This is bad.

Alcohol is bad for driving too. Marijuana can also be bad for people’s lives. But everyone is different. Some people like to use things too much. This can be bad.

I say yes. Many things the Church does are old. This is good. It is good to have history. But it is also good to change. Some Catholics think they must go to Church every week. The Church is strict. This is not kind to other religions. We learn to love others. This is a good thing to teach. But it is wrong to say love others and not accept them. Some Church rules say to do good things. But the Church does not always do these things. The rules are old. The Church keeps them.

I not know much about this subject. I not sure what right or wrong. This a hard subject. It about church and state. It about what marriage is. It hard to talk about this.  

I think all unions good. I not know if marriage for the government. Marriage like a church thing.  The church say what marriage is, not the government.

If two people join, that good. They a union. The government should see all unions the same. 

I think if states agree, they make it a law for all states. Banning gay marriage is bad. The constitution for big things, not for this.

I was raised in a Christian home.  Homosexuality is hard for me to understand. I have gay friends. I do not like their way of life. But I think it should be legal.

I do not think it is a big problem for the whole country. I think each state should decide.

Some states have many Democrats. Some have many Republicans. Democrats like gay marriage.  If you live in a state that likes gay marriage, you should accept it. You chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as everyone else.  Each state should decide if gay marriage is allowed.

I do not think the president should say no to gay marriage for the whole country.  He lives in one state. He should not tell other states what to do.

Maybe the president will leave office soon. A new president might say yes to gay marriage.  It might go back and forth.  Each state should decide. They live there.

It is hard to know what is right. You must be careful what you post on the internet. Things stay on the internet. 

The school wants to keep everyone safe.

We did not work well together. We did not have a goal.

I think we should leave. We are hurting ourselves.

The Catholic Church needs to change. Many people are leaving the church. This is because the church has strong views on some things. For example, the church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These views are old. The church should think about new ideas. This will help the church keep its members. 

People are not happy with the church's views. Some people do not agree with the church on these subjects. The church is against abortion. If a person wants an abortion, they may not want to be part of the church.

The same is true for gay marriage. If a person supports gay marriage, they may not want to be part of the church. 

I think priests should be able to marry. Priests are very good at their jobs.  But they also need a family. Everyone else has a job and a family. Priests should be able to have both.

Gay marriage is good. I think people should be free to love who they want. People are born this way. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be bad for who they are. It is not fair to say that a man and a woman can get married but two men or two women cannot. It is wrong.

I think the government should not be involved. It is not a legal problem. It is not a moral problem. The government should not tell people who they can love. Gay people should not be punished for this.

Gay marriage is good. There is no good reason to not allow it. Some people think gay couples are bad for families. But gay couples are different. They are not the same as straight couples.

Gay couples want the same rights as straight couples. They want to pay taxes and make health care decisions for each other. If a gay person is sick, their partner can not be in the room. This is not fair.

Many studies show gay couples are the same as straight couples. They are happy. 

Gay people want a marriage paper from the government. This is not about religion. The government should not make laws based on religion.

Some people say gay people are bad for children. But children of gay parents are the same as children of straight parents.

The government should make gay marriage legal in all states. This is fair.

I work at a hospital. I help people get medicine. Some drugs are bad and illegal. But some drugs can help people. Some drugs are both bad and illegal.

Marijuana is illegal. But it can help some people feel better. Some drugs are illegal but help people. Doctors use them. We need to help people who need medicine.

Some people say marijuana is bad. But it is not as bad as some other drugs. If people can use marijuana safely, it can help them.

We should learn more about marijuana. We should not be afraid of it.

The church has changed. It is not as strict now. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school. I saw my friends there. We would go to church.

Now, there is a mass for teens. It is thirty minutes long. People dress more casually. In summer, people come in beach clothes. Families come in late.

Even at the morning mass, people wear jeans and khakis.

The biggest change is the dress code.

I do not know much about church politics.

[About the priest problems, do you think the church should change?]

I do not think these things could have been stopped. Married men can be bad. They can like young children.

I think priests choose to be priests. Some religions let priests marry. If they want to be married, they can join a different religion.

[Can you say more about this?]

I think being bad with children is about genetics. People are born that way. It is not about how they are raised.

Marriage will not help. 

I think the church could not stop this. If they knew and hid it, that is wrong. But I do not think they always knew.

[Do you have other thoughts about the church?]

I was good with the plan at first. But many people were sad about the September 11 attacks. I think we went to Iraq for wrong reasons. The Bush group said Iraq was bad. They said Iraq had bad weapons. They said Iraq was bad for America. This was not true.

I am mad about this. I think the Bush group lied to the people. Even Colin Powell said he did not think Iraq was bad. He gave a speech at the United Nations. Now he says he did not believe the facts. This is wrong. This is bad for the country.

I think the Bush group does not like the rules of our country. They want to change them. Since September 11, things have changed.

I think the Bush group wanted to go to war.

The man who had money for the country said the Bush group wanted war. He wrote about it in a book. He left his job.

I think the young Bush man wanted to fight Iraq. His father had a fight with Iraq before. I think he wanted oil from Iraq.

I think we should leave Iraq. But it will be bad if we leave now. Iraq may fight among itself. More people will die.

The United Nations and the United States want other countries to help Iraq. But I do not like this idea. Other countries will have too much power. Iraq will not be in control of itself.

The leader of Iraq is weak. His group is not working well. The man who was fighting us is now in the government. He has many seats in the government.

Iraq is fighting with itself.

The Iraq War is hard to talk about. I do not know much about it. 

I think the war is not fair. We did not declare war. We use guns to show we are strong. 

I do not think it is good to call it a war. We should help Iraq. But it is hard. We use many resources. The war makes people sad.

The president looks bad.  People say he made a bad war like the Vietnam War.

Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to come home. But the people in Iraq need help too.

Iraq has many problems. They fight with each other. We want to help them. But we are different. We should not change them.

The war will go on for a long time.

I do not think it is right to make this legal. This is a question for the churches. The Constitution says the church and state must be separate. This is clear. It is wrong to try to make rules about this. This goes against what the Constitution says. 

Some people want to make this illegal. This is bad. It is like choosing one church over another. Most Catholics and Christians do not support this.

The government should not say what churches can and cannot do. The separation of church and state is very important. It lets people have different religions.

Changing the Constitution to ban this would be wrong. It would go against what the Constitution already says. It would be one of the few changes that would hurt people, not help the government.

The government should not be involved in this. The person trying to change the law wants to do this because of his own beliefs. He likes one religion more than others.

The churches should decide this, not the president or the government. There is no good reason to ban this. It will not help the economy. It may even help society.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the true reason for the war. They said the war was about the bad things that happened on September 11th. This was not true. The government used people's fear to start the war.

I am against war. It is wrong to attack first. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government made the same mistakes. Many American soldiers died in Iraq. The government was not ready for what would happen after the war.

The government took away the Iraqi government. They tried to give Iraq a new government. This is like what happened in Vietnam. The US tried to stop communism. The US thought it would be easy to win. It was not easy.

The US should not have gone to war in Iraq. They should have planned for all the problems. The war is still going on. Many American soldiers are still dying. It is hard to make Iraq a peaceful country. The US government did not tell the people the truth about the war. 

The US should think about how many soldiers have died. Is it worth it to keep fighting? Why is the US only trying to make Iraq a democracy? Why not help other countries? The US may want to control oil in Iraq.

The US said Iraq had bad weapons. These weapons were not found. The US knows that North Korea has bad weapons, but they are not attacking. The US government is not being honest.

I hope the war ends soon. I hope there is peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a personal choice.  Some studies say it may be in a person's genes. This means people cannot choose to be gay. It is not fair to give people less rights because of this.

I think it is wrong to stop people from getting married because they are gay. Marriage is a personal thing. It is between two people. The government should not have a say in this.

I know some gay couples in my neighborhood. They live like other families. They walk their dogs and do normal things. They want to get married but they cannot.

I think it is wrong for the government to tell people what they can and cannot do with their lives.  Some people say being gay is a chemical thing in the brain.  You are born this way.

Many people think marriage should be a private matter. People should be able to marry who they want without the government getting involved.

The war has been going on too long. At first, the goal was good. The goal was to give democracy to another country. But now, we may be fighting just to show we are strong.

It is time to stop. The people in that country must fight for themselves. We are spending a lot of money on the war. We need that money for our own problems, like poverty. We have many problems at home.

Yes, I think there is still a problem with men and women not being treated the same in the United States.  It is not just women. It also depends on the type of work. 

I think women still have a hard time. There is a problem called the "glass ceiling." Even though there should be equal chance for all, some men have a hard time working for a woman. This is because of how people have always done things.

A woman may be good for a job. She may have the needed skills. But some people will not give her the job just because women are not often in high places in business. 

This also happens to men. For example, it is not common for a man to stay home to care for children. People may look down on him. They think men should work and be the main money maker. 

In the fashion world, some people do not take men seriously if they like fashion. It is because people think fashion is for women.

I think there is gender discrimination in the United States. It is hard to change because people have strong ideas about how things should be.

But things are slowly getting better. More women are in high jobs. More people accept men who stay home. 

We need to show the good things about people who are often judged. We should not be too forceful. 

Change takes time. We are making progress.

The law did not make marijuana legal. They made it not a crime. This means it is like a traffic ticket. You get a note, not jail.  Some people worry about jobs. A drug charge can hurt your job. even if the law is not very bad.

Some people say it is good to not make marijuana a crime. It costs money to arrest people and take them to court.  Denver has more money now that it does not spend on this. They can use the money for schools or help for older people.

Some people do not like marijuana. They do not want to make it legal. They think it is bad.  Denver is different. People there like change. I think it is good that they make marijuana not a crime.

I do not want marijuana to be sold everywhere. Some people think it is bad. Some people smoke marijuana and then drive. This is bad.

Alcohol is bad for driving too. Marijuana can also be bad for people’s lives. But everyone is different. Some people like to use things too much. This can be bad.

I say yes. Many things the Church does are old. This is good. It is good to have history. But it is also good to change. Some Catholics think they must go to Church every week. The Church is strict. Sometimes I feel the Church does not like people who are not perfect. The Church does not like people of other religions. My dad was not Catholic. The Church would not marry my parents. This is not kind to other religions. We learn to love others. This is a good thing to teach. But it is wrong to say love others and not accept them. Some Church rules say to do good things. But the Church does not always do these things. The rules are old. The Church keeps them. 

I think priests should be able to marry. But this will not stop bad priests. Bad priests do bad things. It does not matter if they are married.

I not know much about this subject. I not sure what right or wrong. This a hard subject. It about church and state. It about what marriage is. It hard to talk about this.  

I think all unions good. I not know if marriage for the government. Marriage like a church thing.  The church say what marriage is, not the government.

If two people join, that good. They a union. The government should see all unions the same. 

I think if states agree, they make it a law for all states. Banning gay marriage is bad. The constitution for big things, not for this.

I was raised in a Christian home.  Homosexuality is hard for me to understand. I have gay friends. I do not like their way of life. But I think it should be legal.

I do not think it is a big problem for the whole country. I think each state should decide.

Some states have many Democrats. Some have many Republicans. Democrats like gay marriage.  If you live in a state that likes gay marriage, you should accept it. You chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as everyone else.  Each state should decide if gay marriage is allowed.

I do not think the president should say no to gay marriage for the whole country.  He lives in one state. He should not tell other states what to do.

Maybe the president will leave office soon. A new president might say yes to gay marriage.  It might go back and forth.  Each state should decide. They live there.

Myspace is for the public. You post things for people to see. If you post on the internet, others can see it. This includes school people.

School people have a job to keep students safe. If they see something bad on Myspace, they may look at it. They want to stop bad things from happening.

Some people say this is wrong. They say it is an invasion of privacy. But some people say it is okay. It is for the safety of students.

It is hard to know what is right. You must be careful what you post on the internet. Things stay on the internet. 

The school wants to keep everyone safe.

The war is a bad thing. I was sad when nine eleven happened. I was mad. I want to hurt the people who did it. But now I see the war is wrong.

We did not plan well. We did not know what we were doing. War is different there. They fight in a way we do not.  

We should leave. They fight each other. They cannot fight us if they fight each other. 

I am sad about nine eleven. I do not care about the war now. I think they are bad people. They fight all the time.

We were angry. We went to war to get revenge. President Bush made a hard choice. But we should have had a better plan. We did not know what to do.

We did not work well together. We did not have a goal.

I think we should leave. We are hurting ourselves.

transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs to change. Many people are leaving the church. This is because the church has strong views on some things. For example, the church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These views are old. The church should think about new ideas. This will help the church keep its members. 

People are not happy with the church's views. Some people do not agree with the church on these subjects. The church is against abortion. If a person wants an abortion, they may not want to be part of the church.

The same is true for gay marriage. If a person supports gay marriage, they may not want to be part of the church. 

I think priests should be able to marry. Priests are very good at their jobs.  But they also need a family. Everyone else has a job and a family. Priests should be able to have both.

Gay marriage is good. I think people should be free to love who they want. People are born this way. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be bad for who they are. It is not fair to say that a man and a woman can get married but two men or two women cannot. It is wrong.

I think the government should not be involved. It is not a legal problem. It is not a moral problem. The government should not tell people who they can love. Gay people should not be punished for this.

Gay marriage is good. There is no good reason to not allow it. Some people think gay couples are bad for families. But gay couples are different. They are not the same as straight couples.

Gay couples want the same rights as straight couples. They want to pay taxes and make health care decisions for each other. If a gay person is sick, their partner can not be in the room. This is not fair.

Many studies show gay couples are the same as straight couples. They are happy. 

Gay people want a marriage paper from the government. This is not about religion. The government should not make laws based on religion.

Some people say gay people are bad for children. But children of gay parents are the same as children of straight parents.

The government should make gay marriage legal in all states. This is fair.

I work at a hospital. I help people get medicine. Some drugs are bad and illegal. But some drugs can help people. Some drugs are both bad and illegal.

Marijuana is illegal. But it can help some people feel better. Some drugs are illegal but help people. Doctors use them. We need to help people who need medicine.

Some people say marijuana is bad. But it is not as bad as some other drugs. If people can use marijuana safely, it can help them.

We should learn more about marijuana. We should not be afraid of it.

The church has changed. It is not as strict now. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school. I saw my friends there. We would go to church.

Now, there is a mass for teens. It is thirty minutes long. People dress more casually. In summer, people come in beach clothes. Families come in late.

Even at the morning mass, people wear jeans and khakis.

The biggest change is the dress code.

I do not know much about church politics.

[About the priest problems, do you think the church should change?]

I do not think these things could have been stopped. Married men can be bad. They can like young children.

I think priests choose to be priests. Some religions let priests marry. If they want to be married, they can join a different religion.

[Can you say more about this?]

I think being bad with children is about genetics. People are born that way. It is not about how they are raised.

Marriage will not help. 

I think the church could not stop this. If they knew and hid it, that is wrong. But I do not think they always knew.

[Do you have other thoughts about the church?]

No.

I was good with the plan at first. But many people were sad about the September 11 attacks. I think we went to Iraq for wrong reasons. The Bush group said Iraq was bad. They said Iraq had bad weapons. They said Iraq was bad for America. This was not true.

I am mad about this. I think the Bush group lied to the people. Even Colin Powell said he did not think Iraq was bad. He gave a speech at the United Nations. Now he says he did not believe the facts. This is wrong. This is bad for the country.

I think the Bush group does not like the rules of our country. They want to change them. Since September 11, things have changed.

I think the Bush group wanted to go to war.

The man who had money for the country said the Bush group wanted war. He wrote about it in a book. He left his job.

I think the young Bush man wanted to fight Iraq. His father had a fight with Iraq before. I think he wanted oil from Iraq.

I think we should leave Iraq. But it will be bad if we leave now. Iraq may fight among itself. More people will die.

The United Nations and the United States want other countries to help Iraq. But I do not like this idea. Other countries will have too much power. Iraq will not be in control of itself.

The leader of Iraq is weak. His group is not working well. The man who was fighting us is now in the government. He has many seats in the government.

Iraq is fighting with itself.

The Iraq War is hard to talk about. I do not know much about it. 

I think the war is not fair. We did not declare war. We use guns to show we are strong. 

I do not think it is good to call it a war. We should help Iraq. But it is hard. We use many resources. The war makes people sad.

The president looks bad.  People say he made a bad war like the Vietnam War.

Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to come home. But the people in Iraq need help too.

Iraq has many problems. They fight with each other. We want to help them. But we are different. We should not change them.

The war will go on for a long time.

I do not think it is right to make this legal. This is a question for the churches. The Constitution says the church and state must be separate. This is clear. It is wrong to try to make rules about this. This goes against what the Constitution says. 

Some people want to make this illegal. This is bad. It is like choosing one church over another. Most Catholics and Christians do not support this.

The government should not say what churches can and cannot do. The separation of church and state is very important. It lets people have different religions.

Changing the Constitution to ban this would be wrong. It would go against what the Constitution already says. It would be one of the few changes that would hurt people, not help the government.

The government should not be involved in this. The person trying to change the law wants to do this because of his own beliefs. He likes one religion more than others.

The churches should decide this, not the president or the government. There is no good reason to ban this. It will not help the economy. It may even help society.

The war in Iraq is bad. The government did not tell the people the true reason for the war. They said the war was about the bad things that happened on September 11th. This was not true. The government used people's fear to start the war.

I am against war. It is wrong to attack first. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government made the same mistakes. Many American soldiers died in Iraq. The government was not ready for what would happen after the war.

The government took away the Iraqi government. They tried to give Iraq a new government. This is like what happened in Vietnam. The US tried to stop communism. The US thought it would be easy to win. It was not easy.

The US should not have gone to war in Iraq. They should have planned for all the problems. The war is still going on. Many American soldiers are still dying. It is hard to make Iraq a peaceful country. The US government did not tell the people the truth about the war. 

The US should think about how many soldiers have died. Is it worth it to keep fighting? Why is the US only trying to make Iraq a democracy? Why not help other countries? The US may want to control oil in Iraq.

The US said Iraq had bad weapons. These weapons were not found. The US knows that North Korea has bad weapons, but they are not attacking. The US government is not being honest.

I hope the war ends soon. I hope there is peace in Iraq.

I support gay marriage. I always have. I think it is a personal choice.  Some studies say it may be in a person's genes. This means people cannot choose to be gay. It is not fair to give people less rights because of this.

I think it is wrong to stop people from getting married because they are gay. Marriage is a personal thing. It is between two people. The government should not have a say in this.

I know some gay couples in my neighborhood. They live like other families. They walk their dogs and do normal things. They want to get married but they cannot.

I think it is wrong for the government to tell people what they can and cannot do with their lives.  Some people say being gay is a chemical thing in the brain.  You are born this way.

Many people think marriage should be a private matter. People should be able to marry who they want without the government getting involved.

When you put things on the net, it is for all to see. You can not take it back.

As a Resident Assistant, I have seen this. You put things on the net. People see them. They think about you.

If you talk about bad things, people will be afraid.

The net is for many people. If you talk about hurting people, the school will know. They must stop it.

You can not be sure if people are joking or serious. Sometimes people say bad things as a joke. But it can be wrong. 

At my school, a friend saw bad things on the net. He told the school. The school looked at the things. They saw words that could be bad. The person may have meant it as a joke. But it was not funny.

You put things on the net. No one has a right to be mad if they see them. 

If you do not want people to see it, do not put it on the net.

The war has been going on too long. At first, the goal was good. The goal was to give democracy to another country. But now, we may be fighting just to show we are strong.

At the start, the reasons for the war may have been bad. President Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein before. If the goal was to give people democracy, that is good. But if there were other reasons, it was not fair.

The war started fast. We showed we were strong. But it has gone on too long.

If we wanted to help people who were ruled by a bad leader, that is a good reason to fight. But our reasons have changed. Now, we may be fighting just to win. We need to end the war.

It is time to stop. The people in that country must fight for themselves. We are spending a lot of money on the war. We need that money for our own problems, like poverty. We have many problems at home.

We need to spend money on schools, roads, and health care. We should not spend money on war. Billions of dollars are being spent. Our citizens are dying in a war we no longer need to fight.

Can I ask a quick question?  

I think it is good that someone looked at the Myspace page.  They saw the bad thing. They helped to save a life.

It is hard to know what to do. We want to keep people safe. But we also want people to have privacy.

It is not right to look at all the students' pages. That is not fair.  

But we must be careful. Some bad things can happen on the internet.

I have a Facebook. I know people can see things about me. I am careful about what I put on the web.

Some people can be bad. They use the internet to find people.

It is hard to know who to trust.

My friend told me about her high school. They did not let students use Myspace.

That is strange. How can a school tell students what they can do on the web?

We talk about the war in Iraq. I know it is hard to talk about. Many people say they were against the war. I was also against it. Now, it is not so important what we think.

The war was a bad idea. Most people think so. The polls show this. People in the United States, Iraq, and around the world think the war was wrong. 

The war is a disaster. It was a disaster before we went there. Now it is still a disaster. It is hard to do anything right in the Middle East.

The war is because of different cultures. The United States and the Middle East are very different.

The United States wants to bring democracy to Iraq. But democracy is not for everyone.  

Saddam Hussein was bad. But, we should think about the bad things before we go to war. We should not go to war unless we have a good reason.

We should leave Iraq. Most Iraqis want us to leave. They know what is best for them.

We should ask Iraq if they want us to stay. If they say no, then we should leave.

Yes, I think there is still a problem with men and women not being treated the same in the United States.  It is not just women. It also depends on the type of work. 

I think women still have a hard time. There is a problem called the "glass ceiling." Even though there should be equal chance for all, some men have a hard time working for a woman. This is because of how people have always done things.

A woman may be good for a job. She may have the needed skills. But some people will not give her the job just because women are not often in high places in business. 

This also happens to men. For example, it is not common for a man to stay home to care for children. People may look down on him. They think men should work and be the main money maker. 

In the fashion world, some people do not take men seriously if they like fashion. It is because people think fashion is for women.

I think there is gender discrimination in the United States. It is hard to change because people have strong ideas about how things should be.

But things are slowly getting better. More women are in high jobs. More people accept men who stay home. 

We need to show the good things about people who are often judged. We should not be too forceful. 

Change takes time. We are making progress.

The law did not make marijuana legal. They made it not a crime. This means it is like a traffic ticket. You get a note, not jail.  Some people worry about jobs. A drug charge can hurt your job. even if the law is not very bad.

Some people say it is good to not make marijuana a crime. It costs money to arrest people and take them to court.  Denver has more money now that it does not spend on this. They can use the money for schools or help for older people.

Some people do not like marijuana. They do not want to make it legal. They think it is bad.  Denver is different. People there like change. I think it is good that they make marijuana not a crime.

I do not want marijuana to be sold everywhere. Some people think it is bad. Some people smoke marijuana and then drive. This is bad.

Alcohol is bad for driving too. Marijuana can also be bad for people’s lives. But everyone is different. Some people like to use things too much. This can be bad.

I say yes. Many things the Church does are old. This is good. It is good to have history. But it is also good to change. Some Catholics think they must go to Church every week. The Church is strict. Sometimes I feel the Church does not like people who are not perfect. The Church does not like people of other religions. My dad was not Catholic. The Church would not marry my parents. This is not kind to other religions. We learn to love others. This is a good thing to teach. But it is wrong to say love others and not accept them. Some Church rules say to do good things. But the Church does not always do these things. The rules are old. The Church keeps them. 

I think priests should be able to marry. But this will not stop bad priests. Bad priests do bad things. It does not matter if they are married.

I not know much about this subject. I not sure what right or wrong. This a hard subject. It about church and state. It about what marriage is. It hard to talk about this.  

I think all unions good. I not know if marriage for the government. Marriage like a church thing.  The church say what marriage is, not the government.

If two people join, that good. They a union. The government should see all unions the same. 

I think if states agree, they make it a law for all states. Banning gay marriage is bad. The constitution for big things, not for this.

I was raised in a Christian home.  Homosexuality is hard for me to understand. I have gay friends. I do not like their way of life. But I think it should be legal.

I do not think it is a big problem for the whole country. I think each state should decide.

Some states have many Democrats. Some have many Republicans. Democrats like gay marriage.  If you live in a state that likes gay marriage, you should accept it. You chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as everyone else.  Each state should decide if gay marriage is allowed.

I do not think the president should say no to gay marriage for the whole country.  He lives in one state. He should not tell other states what to do.

Maybe the president will leave office soon. A new president might say yes to gay marriage.  It might go back and forth.  Each state should decide. They live there.

Myspace is for the public. You post things for people to see. If you post on the internet, others can see it. This includes school people.

School people have a job to keep students safe. If they see something bad on Myspace, they may look at it. They want to stop bad things from happening.

Some people say this is wrong. They say it is an invasion of privacy. But some people say it is okay. It is for the safety of students.

It is hard to know what is right. You must be careful what you post on the internet. Things stay on the internet. 

The school wants to keep everyone safe.

The war is a bad thing. I was sad when nine eleven happened. I was mad. I want to hurt the people who did it. But now I see the war is wrong.

We did not plan well. We did not know what we were doing. War is different there. They fight in a way we do not.  

We should leave. They fight each other. They cannot fight us if they fight each other. 

I am sad about nine eleven. I do not care about the war now. I think they are bad people. They fight all the time.

We were angry. We went to war to get revenge. President Bush made a hard choice. But we should have had a better plan. We did not know what to do.

We did not work well together. We did not have a goal.

I think we should leave. We are hurting ourselves.
